queries.question: Найти топ-5 компаний-владельцев электростанций, у которых средняя стоимость обслуживания превышает среднюю по отрасли за последний год, и показать для каждой компании количество инцидентов высокой и критической важности, а также общую сумму затрат на обслуживание.
queries.sql_query:
WITH CompanyMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        AVG(m.Cost) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
IndustryAverage AS (
    SELECT AVG(AvgMaintenanceCost) AS IndustryAvgCost
    FROM CompanyMaintenance
),
CompanyIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity IN ('Высокая', 'Критическая') THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID
)
SELECT 
    cm.CompanyName,
    ROUND(cm.AvgMaintenanceCost, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,
    ROUND(cm.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    ci.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    ROUND((cm.AvgMaintenanceCost - ia.IndustryAvgCost) / ia.IndustryAvgCost * 100, 2) AS CostDeviationPercent
FROM CompanyMaintenance cm
CROSS JOIN IndustryAverage ia
JOIN CompanyIncidents ci ON cm.CompanyID = ci.CompanyID
WHERE cm.AvgMaintenanceCost > ia.IndustryAvgCost
ORDER BY AvgMaintenanceCost DESC
LIMIT 5;

    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON pp.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID, oc.Name

HighSeverityIncidents AS (
    SELECT

    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
)
SELECT 
    cm.CompanyName,
    cm.AvgCompanyMaintenanceCost,
    hsi.HighSeverityIncidentCount,
    cm.TotalMaintenanceCost
FROM CompanyMaintenance cm
JOIN AverageIndustryMaintenanceCost aimc ON cm.AvgCompanyMaintenanceCost > aimc.AvgIndustryCost
LEFT JOIN HighSeverityIncidents hsi ON cm.OwnerCompanyID = hsi.OwnerCompanyID
ORDER BY cm.AvgCompanyMaintenanceCost DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.question: Найти топ-7 потребителей с наибольшим среднемесячным потреблением энергии за последний год, у которых есть действующие контракты с поставщиками, и показать для каждого потребителя информацию о типе тарифа, стоимости контракта и количестве установленных счетчиков.
queries.sql_query:
WITH ConsumerContracts AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS MetersCount,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgContractPrice,
        MAX(t.Name) AS TariffName
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    JOIN Tariff t ON t.ConsumerType = c.Type
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
)
SELECT 
    cc.ConsumerName,
    cc.ConsumerType,
    ROUND(cc.AverageMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS MonthlyConsumption,
    cc.MetersCount,
    ROUND(cc.AvgContractPrice, 2) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
    cc.TariffName,
    ROUND(cc.AverageMonthlyConsumption * cc.AvgContractPrice, 2) AS EstimatedMonthlyCost
FROM ConsumerContracts cc
ORDER BY cc.AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC
LIMIT 7;
queries.gpt-4o_response:
WITH ActiveConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        ct.PricePerUnit AS ContractPrice,
        t.Name AS TariffName
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Supplier s ON ct.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
    JOIN Tariff t ON c.Type = t.ConsumerType
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
),
ConsumerMeters AS (
    SELECT 
        m.ConsumerID,
        COUNT(m.MeterID) AS MeterCount
    FROM Meter m
    WHERE m.Status = 'Активен'
    GROUP BY m.ConsumerID
)
SELECT 
    ac.ConsumerName,
    ac.ConsumerType,
    ac.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
    ac.ContractPrice,
    ac.TariffName,
    cm.MeterCount
FROM ActiveConsumers ac
JOIN ConsumerMeters cm ON ac.ConsumerID = cm.ConsumerID
ORDER BY ac.AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC
LIMIT 7;

queries.google/gemini-2.0-flash-001_response_ru:
WITH ConsumerConsumption AS (
    SELECT
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        SUM(CASE WHEN ct.Status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ActiveContracts,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS MeterCount
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
    HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN ct.Status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0
),
RankedConsumers AS (
    SELECT
        ConsumerID,
        ConsumerName,
        AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        ActiveContracts,
        MeterCount,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC) AS ConsumptionRank
    FROM ConsumerConsumption
    WHERE ActiveContracts > 0
)
SELECT
    rc.ConsumerName,
    rc.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
    t.Name AS TariffName,
    t.PricePerUnit AS TariffPricePerUnit,
    ct.PricePerUnit AS ContractPricePerUnit,
    rc.MeterCount
FROM RankedConsumers rc
JOIN `Contract` ct ON rc.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
JOIN Tariff t ON t.ConsumerType = rc.ConsumerName
WHERE rc.ConsumptionRank <= 7
ORDER BY rc.AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC
LIMIT 7;

queries.question: Найти топ-6 поставщиков энергоресурсов с наивысшим рейтингом за последний год, которые работают с возобновляемыми источниками энергии, и показать для каждого поставщика информацию о среднем объеме поставок, стоимости единицы ресурса и количестве действующих контрактов.
queries.sql_query:
WITH RenewableSuppliers AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SupplierID,
        s.Name AS SupplierName,
        s.Rating,
        es.Name AS EnergySourceName,
        es.Renewable,
        AVG(s.AnnualSupplyVolume) AS AvgAnnualSupply,
        AVG(es.CostPerUnit) AS AvgCostPerUnit
    FROM Supplier s
    JOIN EnergySource es ON s.SourceID = es.SourceID
    WHERE es.Renewable = TRUE
    GROUP BY s.SupplierID, s.Name, s.Rating, es.Name, es.Renewable
),
ActiveContracts AS (
    SELECT 
        SupplierID,
        COUNT(*) AS ActiveContractsCount
    FROM `Contract`
    WHERE Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY SupplierID
)
SELECT 
    rs.SupplierName,
    rs.EnergySourceName,
    rs.Rating,
    ROUND(rs.AvgAnnualSupply, 2) AS AvgAnnualSupply,
    ROUND(rs.AvgCostPerUnit, 2) AS AvgCostPerUnit,
    ac.ActiveContractsCount,
    ROUND(rs.AvgAnnualSupply * rs.AvgCostPerUnit, 2) AS EstimatedAnnualRevenue
FROM RenewableSuppliers rs
JOIN ActiveContracts ac ON rs.SupplierID = ac.SupplierID
ORDER BY rs.Rating DESC, EstimatedAnnualRevenue DESC
LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Найти топ-5 электростанций с наибольшим количеством инцидентов и нарушений нормативов выбросов за последний год, и показать для каждой станции информацию о последнем аудите, стоимости последнего обслуживания и статусе соответствия экологическим нормам.
queries.sql_query:
WITH PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name
),
PlantEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceCount
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
PlantAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        a.Auditor,
        a.ComplianceStatus,
        a.FollowUpDate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.PlantID ORDER BY a.Date DESC) AS rn
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
),
PlantMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
        m.Date AS LastMaintenanceDate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.PlantID ORDER BY m.Date DESC) AS rn
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
)
SELECT 
    pi.PlantName,
    pi.IncidentsCount,
    pe.NonComplianceCount,
    pa.Auditor AS LastAuditor,
    pa.ComplianceStatus AS AuditStatus,
    pa.FollowUpDate,
    ROUND(pm.LastMaintenanceCost, 2) AS LastMaintenanceCost,
    pm.LastMaintenanceDate
FROM PlantIncidents pi
JOIN PlantEmissions pe ON pi.PlantID = pe.PlantID
JOIN PlantAudits pa ON pi.PlantID = pa.PlantID AND pa.rn = 1
JOIN PlantMaintenance pm ON pi.PlantID = pm.PlantID AND pm.rn = 1
ORDER BY pi.IncidentsCount DESC, pe.NonComplianceCount DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH IncidentCounts AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name
),
EmissionViolations AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(e.EmissionID) AS ViolationCount
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND e.ComplianceStatus != 'Соответствует'
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
TopPlants AS (
    SELECT 
        ic.PlantID,
        ic.PlantName,
        (ic.IncidentCount + COALESCE(ev.ViolationCount, 0)) AS TotalIssues
    FROM IncidentCounts ic
    LEFT JOIN EmissionViolations ev ON ic.PlantID = ev.PlantID
    ORDER BY TotalIssues DESC
    LIMIT 5
),
LatestAudit AS (
    SELECT 
        a.PlantID,
        a.Date AS AuditDate,
        a.Auditor,
        a.ComplianceStatus AS AuditComplianceStatus
    FROM `Audit` a
    JOIN (
        SELECT 
            PlantID,
            MAX(Date) AS LatestAuditDate
        FROM `Audit`
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) la ON a.PlantID = la.PlantID AND a.Date = la.LatestAuditDate
),
LatestMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost
    FROM Maintenance m
    JOIN (
        SELECT 
            PlantID,
            MAX(Date) AS LatestMaintenanceDate
        FROM Maintenance
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) lm ON m.PlantID = lm.PlantID AND m.Date = lm.LatestMaintenanceDate
)
SELECT 
    tp.PlantName,
    la.AuditDate,
    la.Auditor,
    la.AuditComplianceStatus,
    lm.LastMaintenanceCost,
    COALESCE(ev.ViolationCount, 0) AS EmissionViolations
FROM TopPlants tp
LEFT JOIN LatestAudit la ON tp.PlantID = la.PlantID
LEFT JOIN LatestMaintenance lm ON tp.PlantID = lm.PlantID
LEFT JOIN EmissionViolations ev ON tp.PlantID = ev.PlantID
ORDER BY tp.TotalIssues DESC;

WITH RecentIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        i.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY i.PlantID
),
RecentEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID,
        COUNT(e.EmissionID) AS NonComplianceCount
    FROM Emission e
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND e.ComplianceStatus != 'Соответствует'
    GROUP BY e.PlantID
),
PlantIssues AS (
    SELECT 
        COALESCE(ri.PlantID, re.PlantID) AS PlantID,
        COALESCE(ri.IncidentCount, 0) + COALESCE(re.NonComplianceCount, 0) AS TotalIssues
    FROM RecentIncidents ri
    FULL OUTER JOIN RecentEmissions re ON ri.PlantID = re.PlantID
),

    FROM PlantIssues pi
    ORDER BY pi.TotalIssues DESC
    LIMIT 5

    a.Date AS LastAuditDate,
    a.Auditor,
    a.ComplianceStatus AS AuditComplianceStatus,
    m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
    e.ComplianceStatus AS EmissionComplianceStatus
FROM TopPlants tp
JOIN PowerPlant pp ON tp.PlantID = pp.PlantID

WITH PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        COUNT(*) AS IncidentCount
    FROM Incident
    WHERE Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY PlantID
),
PlantEmissions AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        CASE
            WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN 1
            ELSE 0
        END AS EmissionViolation
    FROM Emission
    WHERE Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY PlantID
),
PlantScores AS (
    SELECT
        COALESCE(pi.PlantID, pe.PlantID) AS PlantID,
        COALESCE(pi.IncidentCount, 0) AS IncidentCount,
        COALESCE(pe.EmissionViolation, 0) AS EmissionViolation,
        COALESCE(pi.IncidentCount, 0) + COALESCE(pe.EmissionViolation, 0) AS TotalScore
    FROM PlantIncidents pi
    FULL OUTER JOIN PlantEmissions pe ON pi.PlantID = pe.PlantID
),
RankedPlants AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        IncidentCount,
        EmissionViolation,
        TotalScore,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY TotalScore DESC) AS Rank
    FROM PlantScores
)
SELECT
    pp.Name AS PlantName,
    rp.IncidentCount,
    rp.EmissionViolation,
    a.Date AS LastAuditDate,
    a.Auditor AS LastAuditor,
    a.Findings AS LastAuditFindings,
    m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
    e.ComplianceStatus AS LastEmissionStatus
FROM RankedPlants rp
JOIN PowerPlant pp ON rp.PlantID = pp.PlantID
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT PlantID, Date, Auditor, Findings
    FROM `Audit`
    WHERE Date = (SELECT MAX(Date) FROM `Audit` a2 WHERE a2.PlantID = `Audit`.PlantID)
) a ON rp.PlantID = a.PlantID
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT PlantID, Cost
    FROM Maintenance
    WHERE Date = (SELECT MAX(Date) FROM Maintenance m2 WHERE m2.PlantID = Maintenance.PlantID)
) m ON rp.PlantID = m.PlantID
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT PlantID, ComplianceStatus
    FROM Emission
    WHERE Date = (SELECT MAX(Date) FROM Emission e2 WHERE e2.PlantID = Emission.PlantID)
) e ON rp.PlantID = e.PlantID
WHERE rp.Rank <= 5
ORDER BY rp.TotalScore DESC;

WITH PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceCount
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name
),
LastAudit AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        MAX(a.AuditID) AS LastAuditID
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
LastMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        MAX(m.MaintenanceID) AS LastMaintenanceID
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
ComplianceStatus AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        e.ComplianceStatus
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date = (SELECT MAX(Date) FROM Emission)
)
SELECT 
    pi.PlantName,
    pi.TotalIncidentsCount,
    pi.NonComplianceCount,
    a.Findings AS LastAuditFindings,
    a.Recommendations AS LastAuditRecommendations,
    m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
    cs.ComplianceStatus
FROM PlantIncidents pi
JOIN LastAudit la ON pi.PlantID = la.PlantID
JOIN `Audit` a ON la.LastAuditID = a.AuditID
JOIN LastMaintenance lm ON pi.PlantID = lm.PlantID
JOIN Maintenance m ON lm.LastMaintenanceID = m.MaintenanceID
JOIN ComplianceStatus cs ON pi.PlantID = cs.PlantID
ORDER BY pi.TotalIncidentsCount DESC, pi.NonComplianceCount DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH IncidentCounts AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidents
    FROM PowerPlant p
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name
),
EmissionViolations AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(e.EmissionID) AS TotalViolations
    FROM PowerPlant p
    LEFT JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) 
    AND e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует'
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
CombinedIssues AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        p.Status AS PlantStatus,
        oc.Name AS OwnerName,
        IFNULL(ic.TotalIncidents, 0) AS TotalIncidents,
        IFNULL(ev.TotalViolations, 0) AS TotalViolations,
        IFNULL(ic.TotalIncidents, 0) + IFNULL(ev.TotalViolations, 0) AS TotalIssues
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    LEFT JOIN IncidentCounts ic ON p.PlantID = ic.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN EmissionViolations ev ON p.PlantID = ev.PlantID
),
LastMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
        m.Date AS LastMaintenanceDate,
        m.Status AS MaintenanceStatus
    FROM Maintenance m
    JOIN (
        SELECT PlantID, MAX(Date) AS MaxDate
        FROM Maintenance
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) lm ON m.PlantID = lm.PlantID AND m.Date = lm.MaxDate
),
LastAudit AS (
    SELECT 
        a.PlantID,
        a.Auditor,
        a.Findings AS AuditFindings,
        a.Recommendations AS AuditRecommendations,
        a.ComplianceStatus AS AuditComplianceStatus,
        a.Date AS AuditDate
    FROM `Audit` a
    JOIN (
        SELECT PlantID, MAX(Date) AS MaxDate
        FROM `Audit`
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) la ON a.PlantID = la.PlantID AND a.Date = la.MaxDate
),
LatestEmissionStatus AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID,
        e.ComplianceStatus AS EmissionComplianceStatus,
        e.Date AS LastEmissionCheck
    FROM Emission e
    JOIN (
        SELECT PlantID, MAX(Date) AS MaxDate
        FROM Emission
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) le ON e.PlantID = le.PlantID AND e.Date = le.MaxDate
)
SELECT 
    ci.PlantName,
    ci.PlantType,
    ci.OwnerName,
    ci.TotalIncidents,
    ci.TotalViolations,
    la.AuditDate,
    la.AuditFindings,
    la.AuditRecommendations,
    la.AuditComplianceStatus,
    lm.LastMaintenanceCost,
    lm.LastMaintenanceDate,
    lm.MaintenanceStatus,
    les.EmissionComplianceStatus
FROM CombinedIssues ci
LEFT JOIN LastAudit la ON ci.PlantID = la.PlantID
LEFT JOIN LastMaintenance lm ON ci.PlantID = lm.PlantID
LEFT JOIN LatestEmissionStatus les ON ci.PlantID = les.PlantID
ORDER BY ci.TotalIssues DESC
LIMIT 5;

queries.question: Найти топ-10 подстанций с наибольшим количеством подключенных линий электропередачи и высокой нагрузкой за последний год, которые обслуживают промышленных потребителей, и показать для каждой подстанции информацию о типе потребителей, среднем потреблении и стоимости обслуживания.
queries.sql_query:
WITH SubstationLoad AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        s.Name AS SubstationName,
        s.CapacityMW,
        COUNT(DISTINCT tl.LineID) AS ConnectedLinesCount,
        SUM(tl.CapacityMW) AS TotalLineCapacity
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN TransmissionLine tl ON s.SubstationID = tl.LineID
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID, s.Name, s.CapacityMW
),
IndustrialConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS MetersCount
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE c.Type = 'Промышленность'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
),
SubstationMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        AVG(m.Cost) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN Maintenance m ON 1=1
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
)
SELECT 
    sl.SubstationName,
    sl.CapacityMW,
    sl.ConnectedLinesCount,
    ROUND(sl.TotalLineCapacity, 2) AS TotalLineCapacity,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ic.ConsumerID) AS IndustrialConsumersCount,
    ROUND(AVG(ic.AverageMonthlyConsumption), 2) AS AvgConsumerConsumption,
    ROUND(sm.AvgMaintenanceCost, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,
    sm.MaintenanceCount
FROM SubstationLoad sl
CROSS JOIN IndustrialConsumers ic
JOIN SubstationMaintenance sm ON sl.SubstationID = sm.SubstationID
GROUP BY sl.SubstationID, sl.SubstationName, sl.CapacityMW, sl.ConnectedLinesCount, sl.TotalLineCapacity, sm.AvgMaintenanceCost, sm.MaintenanceCount
ORDER BY sl.ConnectedLinesCount DESC, sl.CapacityMW DESC
LIMIT 10;

    WHERE c.Type = 'Промышленность' AND ct.Status = 'active'

        s.SubstationID,
        ic.ConsumerType,
        AVG(ic.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
        SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) AS TotalServiceCost
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN TransmissionLine tl ON s.SubstationID = tl.LineID
    JOIN IndustrialConsumers ic ON tl.LineID = ic.SupplierID
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON ic.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID, ic.ConsumerType
)

    sca.ConsumerType,
    ROUND(sca.AvgMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
    ROUND(sca.TotalServiceCost, 2) AS TotalServiceCost,
    slc.ConnectedLinesCount
FROM SubstationLineConnections slc

    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
SubstationMaintenanceCosts AS (
    SELECT
        s.SubstationID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost
    FROM Substation s
    LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON s.PlantID = m.SubstationID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
)
SELECT
    sc.SubstationName,
    sc.SubstationLocation,
    sc.SubstationCapacity,
    sc.ConnectedLinesCount,
    ic.ConsumerType,
    AVG(ic.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
    COALESCE(smc.TotalMaintenanceCost, 0) AS TotalMaintenanceCost
FROM SubstationConnections sc
JOIN Substation s ON sc.SubstationID = s.SubstationID
JOIN IndustrialConsumers ic ON 1=1
LEFT JOIN SubstationMaintenanceCosts smc ON sc.SubstationID = smc.SubstationID
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM `Contract` ct
    JOIN ConsumerContracts cc ON ct.ConsumerID = cc.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.ConsumerID IN (SELECT ConsumerID FROM IndustrialConsumers)
)
GROUP BY sc.SubstationID, sc.SubstationName, sc.SubstationLocation, sc.SubstationCapacity, sc.ConnectedLinesCount, ic.ConsumerType, smc.TotalMaintenanceCost
ORDER BY sc.ConnectedLinesCount DESC, sc.SubstationCapacity DESC
LIMIT 10;

queries.question: Найти топ-11 электростанций с наибольшим количеством нарушений экологических норм и высоким уровнем выбросов за последние 6 месяцев, которые требуют срочного обслуживания, и показать для каждой станции информацию о последних инцидентах, стоимости ремонтов и рекомендациях аудиторов.
queries.sql_query:
WITH ProblematicPlants AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) AS ViolationsCount,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgEmissions,
        MAX(e.Date) AS LastEmissionDate
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type
    HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) > 1
),
RecentIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        MAX(i.Severity) AS LastIncidentSeverity
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
MaintenanceCosts AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        MAX(m.Date) AS LastMaintenanceDate,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
LatestAudit AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        a.Auditor,
        a.Recommendations,
        a.ComplianceStatus,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.PlantID ORDER BY a.Date DESC) AS rn
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
)
SELECT 
    pp.PlantName,
    pp.PlantType,
    pp.ViolationsCount,
    ROUND(pp.AvgEmissions, 2) AS AvgEmissions,
    ri.IncidentsCount,
    ri.LastIncidentSeverity,
    ROUND(mc.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    mc.MaintenanceCount,
    la.Recommendations AS LatestAuditRecommendations,
    la.ComplianceStatus AS LatestAuditStatus
FROM ProblematicPlants pp
JOIN RecentIncidents ri ON pp.PlantID = ri.PlantID
JOIN MaintenanceCosts mc ON pp.PlantID = mc.PlantID
JOIN LatestAudit la ON pp.PlantID = la.PlantID AND la.rn = 1
ORDER BY pp.ViolationsCount DESC, pp.AvgEmissions DESC
LIMIT 11;

WITH RecentEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID,
        SUM(e.CO2Emissions + e.SO2Emissions + e.NOxEmissions + e.ParticulateMatter) AS TotalEmissions,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus != 'Соответствует' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceCount
    FROM Emission e
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY e.PlantID
),
RecentIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        i.PlantID,
        i.Date AS LastIncidentDate,
        i.Description AS LastIncidentDescription,
        i.Severity AS LastIncidentSeverity,
        i.Impact AS LastIncidentImpact,
        i.Resolution AS LastIncidentResolution
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Date = (
        SELECT MAX(i2.Date)
        FROM Incident i2
        WHERE i2.PlantID = i.PlantID
    )
),
RecentMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount
    FROM Maintenance m
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY m.PlantID
),
RecentAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        a.PlantID,
        a.Recommendations AS LastAuditRecommendations
    FROM `Audit` a
    WHERE a.Date = (
        SELECT MAX(a2.Date)
        FROM `Audit` a2
        WHERE a2.PlantID = a.PlantID
    )
)
SELECT 
    pp.Name AS PlantName,
    pp.Location AS PlantLocation,
    pp.CapacityMW,
    re.TotalEmissions,
    re.NonComplianceCount,
    ri.LastIncidentDate,
    ri.LastIncidentDescription,
    ri.LastIncidentSeverity,
    ri.LastIncidentImpact,
    ri.LastIncidentResolution,
    rm.TotalMaintenanceCost,
    rm.MaintenanceCount,
    ra.LastAuditRecommendations
FROM RecentEmissions re
JOIN PowerPlant pp ON re.PlantID = pp.PlantID
LEFT JOIN RecentIncidents ri ON re.PlantID = ri.PlantID
LEFT JOIN RecentMaintenance rm ON re.PlantID = rm.PlantID
LEFT JOIN RecentAudits ra ON re.PlantID = ra.PlantID
WHERE re.NonComplianceCount > 0
ORDER BY re.NonComplianceCount DESC, re.TotalEmissions DESC
LIMIT 11;

        Date,
        CO2Emissions,
        SO2Emissions,
        NOxEmissions,
        ParticulateMatter,
        ComplianceStatus
    FROM Emission
    WHERE Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
),
PlantEmissionViolations AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        COUNT(*) AS ViolationCount,
        AVG(CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        AVG(SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        AVG(NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions,
        AVG(ParticulateMatter) AS AvgParticulateMatter
    FROM RecentEmissions
    WHERE ComplianceStatus != 'Соответствует'
    GROUP BY PlantID
    HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
),
TopPlants AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        ViolationCount,
        AvgCO2Emissions,
        AvgSO2Emissions,
        AvgNOxEmissions,
        AvgParticulateMatter
    FROM PlantEmissionViolations
    ORDER BY ViolationCount DESC
    LIMIT 11
)
SELECT

    tp.AvgSO2Emissions,

    i.Date AS LastIncidentDate,
    i.Description AS LastIncidentDescription,
    m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
    a.Recommendations AS AuditRecommendations
FROM TopPlants tp
JOIN PowerPlant pp ON tp.PlantID = pp.PlantID
LEFT JOIN (

) i ON tp.PlantID = i.PlantID

    FROM `Audit`

) a ON tp.PlantID = a.PlantID

        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,

IncidentAnalysis AS (

    FROM Incident i

    GROUP BY i.PlantID
),
MaintenanceAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        MAX(m.NextScheduledDate) AS NextMaintenanceDate
    FROM Maintenance m
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)

),
AuditRecommendations AS (

        p.PlantID,

        COUNT(DISTINCT e.EmissionID) AS ViolationCount,

    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    AND e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует'
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type, oc.Name
    ORDER BY ViolationCount DESC, AvgTotalEmissions DESC
    LIMIT 11
),
PlantMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        MAX(m.Date) AS LastMaintenanceDate,
        MAX(m.NextScheduledDate) AS NextMaintenanceDate
    FROM HighEmissionPlants p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Status IN ('Завершено', 'В процессе')
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        i.IncidentID,
        i.Date AS IncidentDate,
        i.Description AS IncidentDescription,
        i.Severity,
        i.Impact,
        i.Resolution,
        i.DurationHours
    FROM HighEmissionPlants p

    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
),
PlantAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        a.AuditID,
        a.Date AS AuditDate,
        a.Auditor,
        a.Findings,
        a.Recommendations,
        a.ComplianceStatus
    FROM HighEmissionPlants p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)

    p.OwnerName,

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH TopNonCompliantPlants AS (
    SELECT 
        ep.PlantID,
        ep.Name AS PlantName,
        ep.Location,
        ep.CommissionDate,
        ep.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(*) AS NonComplianceCount,
        SUM(ep.CO2Emissions + ep.SO2Emissions + ep.NOxEmissions + ep.ParticulateMatter) AS TotalPollution
    FROM Emission ep
    WHERE ep.ComplianceStatus <> 'Соответствует' 
      AND ep.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY ep.PlantID, ep.Name, ep.Location, ep.CommissionDate, ep.OwnerCompanyID
    ORDER BY NonComplianceCount DESC, TotalPollution DESC
    LIMIT 11
),
LatestIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        ti.PlantID,
        MAX(ti.Date) AS LatestIncidentDate,
        STRING_AGG(CONCAT('Описание инцидента:', ti.Description, ', Решение:', ti.Resolution), '; ') AS IncidentsSummary
    FROM Incident ti
    WHERE ti.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY ti.PlantID
),
LastAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        ta.PlantID,
        MAX(ta.Date) AS LatestAuditDate,
        STRING_AGG(CONCAT('Рекомендации аудита:', ta.Recommendations), '; ') AS AuditRecommendations
    FROM `Audit` ta
    WHERE ta.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY ta.PlantID
),
RecentMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        rm.PlantID,
        SUM(rm.Cost) AS RecentMaintenanceCost
    FROM Maintenance rm
    WHERE rm.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY rm.PlantID
)
SELECT 
    tn.Plants.*,
    li.LatestIncidentDate,
    li.IncidentsSummary,
    la.LatestAuditDate,
    la.AuditRecommendations,
    rm.RecentMaintenanceCost
FROM TopNonCompliantPlants tn
LEFT JOIN LatestIncidents li ON tn.PlantID = li.PlantID
LEFT JOIN LastAudits la ON tn.PlantID = la.PlantID
LEFT JOIN RecentMaintenance rm ON tn.PlantID = rm.PlantID
ORDER BY tn.NonComplianceCount DESC, tn.TotalPollution DESC;

    WHERE em.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)

        i.Severity,
        i.Impact,

        i.ReportedBy
    FROM HighEmissionPlants hi
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON hi.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)

LatestAudits AS (

    li.Severity,

queries.question: Найти топ-12 потребителей с нестабильным потреблением энергии и высокими затратами за последний год, которые используют несколько типов счетчиков, и показать для каждого потребителя информацию о паттернах потребления, стоимости контрактов и рекомендациях по оптимизации.
queries.sql_query:
WITH ConsumerPatterns AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS MeterTypesCount,
        MAX(m.LastReadingDate) AS LastReadingDate,
        AVG(m.LastReading) AS AvgReading
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.LastReadingDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
),
ContractAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
        SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ActiveContractsCount
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
ConsumptionVariability AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        STDDEV(m.LastReading) AS ConsumptionStdDev,
        MAX(m.LastReading) - MIN(m.LastReading) AS ConsumptionRange
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.LastReadingDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
)
SELECT 
    cp.ConsumerName,
    cp.ConsumerType,
    cp.ConsumptionPattern,
    ROUND(cp.AverageMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
    cp.MeterTypesCount,
    ROUND(ca.AvgPricePerUnit, 2) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
    ROUND(ca.TotalContractVolume, 2) AS TotalContractVolume,
    ca.ActiveContractsCount,
    ROUND(cv.ConsumptionStdDev, 2) AS ConsumptionVariability,
    ROUND(cv.ConsumptionRange, 2) AS ConsumptionRange,
    CASE 
        WHEN cv.ConsumptionStdDev > cp.AverageMonthlyConsumption * 0.3 THEN 'Высокая нестабильность потребления'
        WHEN cv.ConsumptionStdDev > cp.AverageMonthlyConsumption * 0.15 THEN 'Средняя нестабильность потребления'
        ELSE 'Низкая нестабильность потребления'
    END AS ConsumptionStability
FROM ConsumerPatterns cp
JOIN ContractAnalysis ca ON cp.ConsumerID = ca.ConsumerID
JOIN ConsumptionVariability cv ON cp.ConsumerID = cv.ConsumerID
ORDER BY cv.ConsumptionStdDev DESC, cp.AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC
LIMIT 12;

        SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) AS TotalContractCost
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.Location, c.ContactName, c.ContactPhone, c.ContactEmail, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) > 1 AND SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) > 1000000
),
ConsumerEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Supplier s ON ct.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
    JOIN EnergySource es ON s.SourceID = es.SourceID
    JOIN Emission e ON es.SourceID = e.SourceID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active' AND e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
Recommendations AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        'Оптимизация потребления энергии' AS Recommendation
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN UnstableConsumers uc ON c.ConsumerID = uc.ConsumerID
    WHERE uc.MeterCount > 1 AND uc.TotalContractCost > 1000000
)
SELECT 
    uc.ConsumerName,
    uc.ConsumerType,
    uc.Location,
    uc.ContactName,
    uc.ContactPhone,
    uc.ContactEmail,
    uc.ConsumptionPattern,
    uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
    uc.MeterCount,
    uc.TotalContractCost,
    r.Recommendation
FROM UnstableConsumers uc
JOIN Recommendations r ON uc.ConsumerID = r.ConsumerID
ORDER BY uc.TotalContractCost DESC
LIMIT 12;

        c.Type AS ConsumerType,

        c.ContactName,
        c.ContactPhone,
        c.ContactEmail,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS MeterCount,
        SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) AS TotalContractCost
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.Location, c.ContactName, c.ContactPhone, c.ContactEmail, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
),
UnstableConsumers AS (

        ca.ContactName,

    WHERE ca.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%Низкий%' OR ca.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%Высокий%'
),
TopConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        uc.ConsumerID,
        uc.ConsumerName,
        uc.ConsumerType,
        uc.Location,
        uc.ContactName,
        uc.ContactPhone,
        uc.ContactEmail,
        uc.ConsumptionPattern,
        uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        uc.MeterCount,
        uc.TotalContractCost,

    FROM UnstableConsumers uc
    WHERE uc.MeterCount > 1
)
SELECT

    tc.ConsumerType,
    tc.Location,
    tc.ContactName,

        WHEN tc.AverageMonthlyConsumption > 10000 THEN 'Средние затраты'
        ELSE 'Низкие затраты'
    END AS CostLevel,
    CASE 
        WHEN tc.MeterCount > 3 THEN 'Много типов счетчиков'
        WHEN tc.MeterCount > 1 THEN 'Несколько типов счетчиков'
        ELSE 'Один тип счетчика'
    END AS MeterLevel
FROM TopConsumers tc
WHERE tc.RowNum <= 12
ORDER BY tc.TotalContractCost DESC, tc.MeterCount DESC;

WITH UnstableConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.Location,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS MeterTypesCount,
        MAX(m.LastReadingDate) AS LastReadingDate,
        DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, MAX(m.LastReadingDate)) AS DaysSinceLastReading,
        ABS(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption - (SELECT AVG(AverageMonthlyConsumption) FROM Consumer)) / (SELECT AVG(AverageMonthlyConsumption) FROM Consumer) AS ConsumptionDeviation,
        SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) AS TotalContractCost
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active' 
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.Location, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) > 1 AND AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) > (
        SELECT AVG(PricePerUnit) 
        FROM `Contract` 
        WHERE Status = 'active'
    )
)
SELECT 
    uc.ConsumerName,
    uc.ConsumerType,
    uc.Location,
    uc.ConsumptionPattern,
    ROUND(uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS AverageMonthlyConsumption,
    uc.MeterTypesCount,
    ROUND(uc.TotalContractCost, 2) AS TotalContractCost,
    ROUND(uc.ConsumptionDeviation * 100, 2) AS ConsumptionDeviationPercentage,
    CASE 
        WHEN uc.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%высокий%' THEN CASE 
            WHEN uc.ConsumptionDeviation > 0.5 THEN 'Установка интеллектуальных счетчиков и системы мониторинга'
            ELSE 'Пересмотр тарифного плана'
        END
        WHEN uc.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%переменный%' THEN CASE 
            WHEN uc.MeterTypesCount >= 2 THEN 'Унификация систем учета'
            ELSE 'Оптимизация графиков потребления'
        END
        ELSE CASE 
            WHEN uc.TotalContractCost > 10000 THEN 'Переговоры о скидке на объем'
            ELSE 'Анализ возможности перехода на другой тариф'
        END
    END AS OptimizationRecommendation
FROM UnstableConsumers uc
ORDER BY uc.ConsumptionDeviation DESC, uc.TotalContractCost DESC
LIMIT 12;

WITH UnstableConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS MeterTypesCount,
        STDDEV(m.LastReading) AS ConsumptionVariability,
        SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) AS TotalContractCost
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) > 1 AND STDDEV(m.LastReading) > 0.2 * AVG(m.LastReading)
)
SELECT 
    uc.ConsumerName,
    uc.ConsumerType,
    uc.ConsumptionPattern,
    ROUND(uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
    uc.MeterTypesCount,
    ROUND(uc.ConsumptionVariability, 2) AS ConsumptionStabilityIndex,
    ROUND(uc.TotalContractCost, 2) AS TotalContractCost,
    CASE 
        WHEN uc.ConsumptionVariability > 0.5 * uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption THEN 'Высокая нестабильность - рекомендуется установка сглаживающих систем'
        ELSE 'Умеренная нестабильность - рекомендуется оптимизация графика потребления'
    END AS OptimizationRecommendation,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.Type SEPARATOR ', ') AS MeterTypesUsed
FROM UnstableConsumers uc
JOIN Meter m ON uc.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
GROUP BY uc.ConsumerName, uc.ConsumerType, uc.ConsumptionPattern, uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption, 
         uc.MeterTypesCount, uc.ConsumptionVariability, uc.TotalContractCost
ORDER BY uc.ConsumptionVariability DESC, uc.TotalContractCost DESC
LIMIT 12;

WITH UnstableHighCostConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Location,
        c.ContactName,
        c.ContactPhone,
        c.ContactEmail,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS DifferentMeterTypesCount,
        AVG(coalesce(ct.PricePerUnit, tar.PricePerUnit)) AS AvgContractTariffPrice,
        SUM(coalesce(ct.Volume, tar.PricePerUnit * c.AverageMonthlyConsumption)) AS TotalExpenditureLastYear
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Tariff tar ON c.ConsumerID = tar.TariffID
    WHERE c.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%нестабильный%' OR c.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%переменный%'
      AND (ct.EndDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) OR tar.ValidTo >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Location, c.ContactName, c.ContactPhone, c.ContactEmail, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
    HAVING DifferentMeterTypesCount > 1
       AND TotalExpenditureLastYear > 10000 -- Adjust threshold based on actual expenditure scale
), 
OptimizationRecommendations AS (
    SELECT 
        uc.ConsumerID,
        CASE 
            WHEN uc.AvgContractTariffPrice > 0.15 THEN 'Переход на ночной тариф'
            WHEN uc.DifferentMeterTypesCount > 3 THEN 'Оптимизация типа счетчика'
            ELSE 'Анализ энергопотребления и оптимизация нагрузок'
        END AS OptimizationRecommendation
    FROM UnstableHighCostConsumers uc
)
SELECT 
    uhc.ConsumerName,
    uhc.Location,
    uhc.ContactName,
    uhc.ContactPhone,
    uhc.ContactEmail,
    uhc.ConsumptionPattern,
    uhc.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
    o.OptimizationRecommendation,
    uhc.AvgContractTariffPrice,
    uhc.TotalExpenditureLastYear
FROM UnstableHighCostConsumers uhc
JOIN OptimizationRecommendations o ON uhc.ConsumerID = o.ConsumerID
ORDER BY uhc.TotalExpenditureLastYear DESC
LIMIT 12;

WITH UnstableHighCostConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Location,
        c.ContactName,
        c.ContactPhone,
        c.ContactEmail,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS DifferentMeterTypesCount,
        AVG(coalesce(ct.PricePerUnit, tar.PricePerUnit)) AS AvgContractTariffPrice
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Tariff tar ON c.ConsumerID = tar.TariffID -- Предположительно связь между потребителем и тарифом возможна через ID тарифа
    WHERE c.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%нестабильный%' OR c.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%переменный%'
      AND (ct.EndDate IS NULL OR ct.EndDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Location, c.ContactName, c.ContactPhone, c.ContactEmail, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
    HAVING DifferentMeterTypesCount > 1
       AND AvgContractTariffPrice > (
           SELECT AVG(AvgContractTariffPrice)
           FROM (
               SELECT AVG(coalesce(ct.PricePerUnit, tar.PricePerUnit)) AS AvgContractTariffPrice
               FROM Consumer c
               LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
               LEFT JOIN Tariff tar ON c.ConsumerID = tar.TariffID
               WHERE (ct.EndDate IS NULL OR ct.EndDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
               GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
           ) subquery
       )
), OptimizationRecommendations AS (
    SELECT 
        uc.ConsumerID,
        uc.ConsumerName,
        uc.Location,
        uc.ContactName,
        uc.ContactPhone,
        uc.ContactEmail,
        uc.ConsumptionPattern,
        uc.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        uc.DifferentMeterTypesCount,
        uc.AvgContractTariffPrice,
        CASE 
            WHEN uc.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%зима%' THEN 'Оптимизация зимнего энергопотребления'
            WHEN uc.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%лето%' THEN 'Оптимизация летнего энергопотребления'
            ELSE 'Анализ сезонной динамики потребления'
        END AS RecommendedOptimizationAction
    FROM UnstableHighCostConsumers uc
)
SELECT *
FROM OptimizationRecommendations
ORDER BY AvgContractTariffPrice DESC
LIMIT 12;

queries.sql_query: WITH CompanyEmissionAnalysis AS (  SELECT  oc.CompanyID,  oc.Name AS CompanyName,  COUNT(DISTINCT e.EmissionID) AS EmissionReportsCount,  AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,  AVG(e.SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,  AVG(e.NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions,  AVG(e.ParticulateMatter) AS AvgParticulateMatter,  COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceCount  FROM OwnerCompany oc  JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID  JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID  WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)  GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name  ),  CompanyIncidentAnalysis AS (  SELECT  oc.CompanyID,  COUNT(DISTINCT i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,  COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,  MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate  FROM OwnerCompany oc  JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID  JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID  WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)  GROUP BY oc.CompanyID  ),  CompanyAuditAnalysis AS (  SELECT  oc.CompanyID,  COUNT(DISTINCT a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,  COUNT(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соблюдено' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceAudits,  MAX(a.Date) AS LastAuditDate  FROM OwnerCompany oc  JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID  JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID  WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)  GROUP BY oc.CompanyID  )  SELECT  cea.CompanyName,  cea.AvgCO2Emissions,  cea.AvgSO2Emissions,  cea.AvgNOxEmissions,  cea.AvgParticulateMatter,  cea.EmissionReportsCount,  cea.NonComplianceCount,  cia.TotalIncidentsCount,  cia.CriticalIncidentsCount,  caa.AuditCount,  caa.NonComplianceAudits  FROM CompanyEmissionAnalysis cea  JOIN CompanyIncidentAnalysis cia ON cea.CompanyID = cia.CompanyID  JOIN CompanyAuditAnalysis caa ON cea.CompanyID = caa.CompanyID  ORDER BY cea.NonComplianceCount DESC, cia.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, WITH EmissionAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.OwnerCompanyID,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions,
        AVG(e.ParticulateMatter) AS AvgParticulateMatter
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
),
IncidentAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidents,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidents,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
),
AuditAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS TotalAudits,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соблюдено' THEN 1 END) AS NonCompliantAudits
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
),
OwnerCompanyRisk AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        ea.AvgCO2Emissions,
        ea.AvgSO2Emissions,
        ea.AvgNOxEmissions,
        ea.AvgParticulateMatter,
        ia.TotalIncidents,
        ia.CriticalIncidents,
        ia.AvgIncidentDuration,
        aa.TotalAudits,
        aa.NonCompliantAudits,
        (ea.AvgCO2Emissions + ea.AvgSO2Emissions + ea.AvgNOxEmissions + ea.AvgParticulateMatter) AS TotalEmissions,
        (ia.CriticalIncidents + aa.NonCompliantAudits) AS RiskFactors
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    LEFT JOIN EmissionAnalysis ea ON oc.CompanyID = ea.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN IncidentAnalysis ia ON oc.CompanyID = ia.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN AuditAnalysis aa ON oc.CompanyID = aa.OwnerCompanyID
)
SELECT 
    ocr.CompanyName,
    ROUND(ocr.TotalEmissions, 2) AS TotalEmissions,
    ocr.TotalIncidents,
    ocr.CriticalIncidents,
    ROUND(ocr.AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    ocr.TotalAudits,
    ocr.NonCompliantAudits,
    ocr.RiskFactors,
    CASE 
        WHEN ocr.RiskFactors > 5 THEN 'Высокий риск'
        WHEN ocr.RiskFactors > 2 THEN 'Средний риск'
        ELSE 'Низкий риск'
    END AS RiskLevel
FROM OwnerCompanyRisk ocr
ORDER BY ocr.RiskFactors DESC, ocr.TotalEmissions DESC
LIMIT 46;

WITH RecentEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.OwnerCompanyID,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions,
        AVG(e.ParticulateMatter) AS AvgParticulateMatter
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
),
RecentIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidents,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidents
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
),
RecentAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS TotalAudits,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соблюдено' THEN 1 END) AS NonCompliantAudits
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.OwnerCompanyID
),
OwnerCompanyAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        COALESCE(re.AvgCO2Emissions, 0) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        COALESCE(re.AvgSO2Emissions, 0) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        COALESCE(re.AvgNOxEmissions, 0) AS AvgNOxEmissions,
        COALESCE(re.AvgParticulateMatter, 0) AS AvgParticulateMatter,
        COALESCE(ri.TotalIncidents, 0) AS TotalIncidents,
        COALESCE(ri.CriticalIncidents, 0) AS CriticalIncidents,
        COALESCE(ra.TotalAudits, 0) AS TotalAudits,
        COALESCE(ra.NonCompliantAudits, 0) AS NonCompliantAudits
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    LEFT JOIN RecentEmissions re ON oc.CompanyID = re.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN RecentIncidents ri ON oc.CompanyID = ri.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN RecentAudits ra ON oc.CompanyID = ra.OwnerCompanyID
)
SELECT 
    oca.CompanyName,
    oca.AvgCO2Emissions,
    oca.AvgSO2Emissions,
    oca.AvgNOxEmissions,
    oca.AvgParticulateMatter,
    oca.TotalIncidents,
    oca.CriticalIncidents,
    oca.TotalAudits,
    oca.NonCompliantAudits,
    CASE 
        WHEN oca.CriticalIncidents > 2 OR oca.NonCompliantAudits > 1 THEN 'Высокий риск'
        WHEN oca.CriticalIncidents > 0 OR oca.NonCompliantAudits > 0 THEN 'Средний риск'
        ELSE 'Низкий риск'
    END AS RiskLevel
FROM OwnerCompanyAnalysis oca
ORDER BY oca.CriticalIncidents DESC, oca.NonCompliantAudits DESC, oca.TotalIncidents DESC
LIMIT 46;

WITH EnvironmentalHistory AS (
    SELECT
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        SUM(e.CO2Emissions + e.SO2Emissions + e.NOxEmissions + e.ParticulateMatter) AS TotalEmissions,
        COUNT(DISTINCT i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidents,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.AuditID) AS TotalAudits
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    LEFT JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID AND e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID AND a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
RiskAssessment AS (
    SELECT
        eh.CompanyID,
        eh.CompanyName,
        eh.PlantName,
        eh.TotalEmissions,
        eh.TotalIncidents,
        eh.TotalAudits,
        (eh.TotalEmissions * 0.4 + eh.TotalIncidents * 0.3 + eh.TotalAudits * 0.3) AS EnvironmentalRiskScore
    FROM EnvironmentalHistory eh
),
SustainabilityStrategies AS (
    SELECT
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        COUNT(DISTINCT r.RegulationID) AS RegulationsCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN r.Name LIKE '%возобновляемых источников энергии%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RenewableEnergyFocus,
        AVG(CASE WHEN r.ComplianceRequirements LIKE '%снижения выбросов%' THEN 10 ELSE 0 END) AS EmissionReductionFocus
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    LEFT JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN Regulation r ON 1=1
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
)
SELECT
    ra.CompanyName,
    ra.PlantName,
    ra.TotalEmissions,
    ra.TotalIncidents,
    ra.TotalAudits,
    ROUND(ra.EnvironmentalRiskScore, 2) AS EnvironmentalRiskScore,
    ss.RegulationsCount,
    ss.RenewableEnergyFocus,
    ss.EmissionReductionFocus
FROM RiskAssessment ra
JOIN SustainabilityStrategies ss ON ra.CompanyID = ss.CompanyID
ORDER BY ra.EnvironmentalRiskScore DESC
LIMIT 46;

    LEFT JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID AND e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID AND a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name, oc.Headquarters, oc.Industry
),
RiskAssessment AS (
    SELECT
        CompanyID,
        CompanyName,
        Headquarters,
        Industry,
        TotalEmissions,
        TotalCO2Emissions,
        TotalSO2Emissions,
        TotalNOxEmissions,
        TotalParticulateMatter,
        TotalIncidents,
        TotalAudits,
        NonComplianceAudits,
        (TotalEmissions * 0.3 + TotalIncidents * 0.4 + NonComplianceAudits * 0.3) AS EnvironmentalRiskScore
    FROM CompanyEnvironmentalData
)
SELECT
    ra.CompanyName,
    ra.Headquarters,
    ra.Industry,
    ra.TotalEmissions,
    ROUND(ra.TotalCO2Emissions, 2) AS TotalCO2Emissions,
    ROUND(ra.TotalSO2Emissions, 2) AS TotalSO2Emissions,
    ROUND(ra.TotalNOxEmissions, 2) AS TotalNOxEmissions,
    ROUND(ra.TotalParticulateMatter, 2) AS TotalParticulateMatter,
    ra.TotalIncidents,
    ra.TotalAudits,
    ra.NonComplianceAudits,
    ROUND(ra.EnvironmentalRiskScore, 2) AS EnvironmentalRiskScore
FROM RiskAssessment ra
ORDER BY ra.EnvironmentalRiskScore DESC
LIMIT 46;

WITH OwnerCompanyEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        SUM(e.CO2Emissions) AS TotalCO2Emissions,
        SUM(e.SO2Emissions) AS TotalSO2Emissions,
        SUM(e.NOxEmissions) AS TotalNOxEmissions,
        SUM(e.ParticulateMatter) AS TotalParticulateMatter
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
OwnerCompanyIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
OwnerCompanyAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS TotalAuditsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соблюдено' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceAuditsCount,
        MAX(a.Date) AS LastAuditDate,
        AVG(a.DurationHours) AS AvgAuditDuration
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
OwnerCompanySustainability AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        SUM(CASE WHEN r.Name LIKE '%устойчивость%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SustainabilityRegulationsCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN r.Name LIKE '%экология%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS EcologyRegulationsCount
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN Regulation r ON 1=1
    WHERE r.EffectiveDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
)
SELECT 
    oce.CompanyName,
    oce.TotalCO2Emissions,
    oce.TotalSO2Emissions,
    oce.TotalNOxEmissions,
    oce.TotalParticulateMatter,
    oci.TotalIncidentsCount,
    oci.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    oci.AvgIncidentDuration,
    oca.TotalAuditsCount,
    oca.NonComplianceAuditsCount,
    oca.AvgAuditDuration,
    os.SustainabilityRegulationsCount,
    os.EcologyRegulationsCount,
    CASE 
        WHEN oce.TotalCO2Emissions > 10000 THEN 'Критический уровень рисков'
        WHEN oce.TotalCO2Emissions > 5000 THEN 'Высокий уровень рисков'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень рисков'
    END AS RiskLevel,
    CASE 
        WHEN os.SustainabilityRegulationsCount > 2 THEN 'Высокий уровень устойчивости'
        WHEN os.SustainabilityRegulationsCount > 0 THEN 'Средний уровень устойчивости'
        ELSE 'Низкий уровень устойчивости'
    END AS SustainabilityLevel
FROM OwnerCompanyEmissions oce
JOIN OwnerCompanyIncidents oci ON oce.CompanyID = oci.CompanyID
JOIN OwnerCompanyAudits oca ON oce.CompanyID = oca.CompanyID
JOIN OwnerCompanySustainability os ON oce.CompanyID = os.CompanyID
ORDER BY oce.TotalCO2Emissions DESC, oci.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC
LIMIT 46;

    JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
CompanyAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS TotalAuditsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соблюдено' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceAuditsCount,
        MAX(a.Date) AS LastAuditDate
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)

),
CompanyRiskAssessment AS (

        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ce.TotalCO2Emissions DESC, ci.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, ca.NonComplianceAuditsCount DESC) AS RiskRank
    FROM CompanyEmissions ce
    JOIN CompanyIncidents ci ON ce.CompanyID = ci.CompanyID
    JOIN CompanyAudits ca ON ce.CompanyID = ca.CompanyID
)
SELECT

queries.deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324_response:
WITH EnvironmentalData AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        COUNT(DISTINCT e.EmissionID) AS EmissionReports,
        SUM(e.CO2Emissions + e.SO2Emissions + e.NOxEmissions + e.ParticulateMatter) AS TotalEmissionVolume,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN e.EmissionID END) AS NonComplianceEmissionCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT i.IncidentID) AS IncidentsCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN i.Severity IN ('Высокая', 'Критическая') THEN i.IncidentID END) AS HighSeverityIncidents,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus IN ('Не соблюдено', 'Частично соблюдено') THEN a.AuditID END) AS NonComplianceAuditCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT pp.PlantID) AS PlantCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN pp.Type = 'ТЭС' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FossilFuelPlants,
        SUM(CASE WHEN es.Renewable = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RenewableEnergyPlants
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID AND e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID AND a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    LEFT JOIN EnergySource es ON pp.Type = CASE 
        WHEN es.Type = 'Водная' THEN 'ГЭС'
        WHEN es.Type = 'Возобновляемая' THEN CASE WHEN es.Name = 'Солнечная энергия' THEN 'СЭС' ELSE 'ВЭС' END
        ELSE pp.Type
    END
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
),
SustainabilityScore AS (
    SELECT 
        *,
        (NonComplianceEmissionCount * 0.3 + HighSeverityIncidents * 0.3 + NonComplianceAuditCount * 0.2 + FossilFuelPlants * 0.2 - RenewableEnergyPlants * 0.1) AS EnvironmentalRiskScore,
        (RenewableEnergyPlants * 0.5 - FossilFuelPlants * 0.3 - NonComplianceEmissionCount * 0.2) AS SustainabilityScore
    FROM EnvironmentalData
)
SELECT 
    CompanyName,
    EmissionReports,
    ROUND(TotalEmissionVolume, 2) AS TotalEmissionVolume,
    NonComplianceEmissionCount,
    IncidentsCount,
    HighSeverityIncidents,
    AuditCount,
    NonComplianceAuditCount,
    PlantCount,
    FossilFuelPlants,
    RenewableEnergyPlants,
    ROUND(EnvironmentalRiskScore, 2) AS EnvironmentalRiskScore,
    ROUND(SustainabilityScore, 2) AS SustainabilityScore,
    CASE 
        WHEN SustainabilityScore > 0 THEN 'Развивающаяся стратегия'
        WHEN SustainabilityScore > -1 THEN 'Начальная стадия'
        ELSE 'Отсутствие стратегии'
    END AS SustainabilityStrategy
FROM SustainabilityScore
ORDER BY EnvironmentalRiskScore DESC, SustainabilityScore ASC, PlantCount DESC
LIMIT 46;

WITH PlantEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.OwnerCompanyID,
        oc.Name AS OwnerName,
        SUM(e.CO2Emissions + e.SO2Emissions + e.NOxEmissions + e.ParticulateMatter) AS TotalEmissions,
        COUNT(e.EmissionID) AS EmissionReportsCount,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.OwnerCompanyID, oc.Name
),
PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CriticalIncidents,
        SUM(i.DurationHours) AS TotalDowntimeHours
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.OwnerCompanyID
),
PlantAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.OwnerCompanyID,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соблюдено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FailedAudits,
        MAX(a.FollowUpDate) AS LastFollowUpDate
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.OwnerCompanyID
),
CompanyRiskScore AS (
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        oc.Headquarters,
        oc.CEO,
        COUNT(DISTINCT pe.PlantID) AS PlantsCount,
        COALESCE(SUM(pe.TotalEmissions), 0) AS TotalEmissions,
        COALESCE(SUM(pe.EmissionReportsCount), 0) AS EmissionReportsCount,
        COALESCE(SUM(pi.IncidentCount), 0) AS IncidentCount,
        COALESCE(SUM(pi.CriticalIncidents), 0) AS CriticalIncidents,
        COALESCE(SUM(pi.TotalDowntimeHours), 0) AS TotalDowntimeHours,
        COALESCE(SUM(pa.AuditCount), 0) AS AuditCount,
        COALESCE(SUM(pa.FailedAudits), 0) AS FailedAudits,
        (COALESCE(SUM(pe.TotalEmissions), 0) * 0.4) + 
        (COALESCE(SUM(pi.IncidentCount), 0) * 0.3) + 
        (COALESCE(SUM(pi.CriticalIncidents), 0) * 0.5) + 
        (COALESCE(SUM(pa.FailedAudits), 0) * 0.3) AS RiskScore
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    LEFT JOIN PowerPlant p ON oc.CompanyID = p.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN PlantEmissions pe ON p.PlantID = pe.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN PlantIncidents pi ON p.PlantID = pi.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN PlantAudits pa ON p.PlantID = pa.PlantID
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name, oc.Headquarters, oc.CEO
)
SELECT 
    CompanyID,
    CompanyName,
    Headquarters,
    CEO,
    PlantsCount,
    ROUND(TotalEmissions, 2) AS TotalEmissions,
    EmissionReportsCount,
    IncidentCount,
    CriticalIncidents,
    ROUND(TotalDowntimeHours, 2) AS TotalDowntimeHours,
    AuditCount,
    FailedAudits,
    ROUND(RiskScore, 2) AS RiskScore,
    CASE 
        WHEN RiskScore > 50 THEN 'Очень высокий риск'
        WHEN RiskScore > 30 THEN 'Высокий риск'
        WHEN RiskScore > 15 THEN 'Средний риск'
        ELSE 'Низкий риск'
    END AS RiskLevel
FROM CompanyRiskScore
ORDER BY RiskScore DESC
LIMIT 46;
queries.gigachat_response:
WITH EnvironmentalHistory AS (
    -- Анализ выбросов за последний год
    SELECT 
        ep.PlantID,
        AVG(ep.CO2Emissions + ep.SO2Emissions + ep.NOxEmissions + ep.ParticulateMatter) AS AvgTotalEmissions
    FROM Emission ep
    WHERE ep.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY ep.PlantID
), 
IncidentAnalysis AS (
    -- Инцидентность на станциях за последний год
    SELECT 
        i.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        SUM(i.DurationHours) AS TotalIncidentDuration
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY i.PlantID
), 
AuditFindings AS (
    -- Аудиторы выявили проблемы за последний год
    SELECT 
        a.PlantID,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus != 'Соблюдено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NonCompliantAudits
    FROM `Audit` a
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY a.PlantID
), 
SustainabilityScore AS (
    -- Оцениваем стратегию устойчивого развития владельцев
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        AVG(es.Efficiency) AS AvgEnergyEfficiency,
        SUM(CASE WHEN es.Renewable THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) AS RenewableRatio
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    LEFT JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN EnergySource es ON pp.Type = es.Type
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID
)
-- Объединяем данные и получаем итоговую оценку сложности экологической истории
SELECT 
    oc.Name AS CompanyName,
    oc.Headquarters,
    oc.Revenue,
    eh.AvgTotalEmissions,
    ia.IncidentCount,
    ia.TotalIncidentDuration,
    af.NonCompliantAudits,
    ss.AvgEnergyEfficiency,
    ss.RenewableRatio
FROM OwnerCompany oc
LEFT JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
LEFT JOIN EnvironmentalHistory eh ON pp.PlantID = eh.PlantID
LEFT JOIN IncidentAnalysis ia ON pp.PlantID = ia.PlantID
LEFT JOIN AuditFindings af ON pp.PlantID = af.PlantID
LEFT JOIN SustainabilityScore ss ON oc.CompanyID = ss.CompanyID
WHERE eh.AvgTotalEmissions IS NOT NULL OR ia.IncidentCount IS NOT NULL OR af.NonCompliantAudits IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name, oc.Headquarters, oc.Revenue, eh.AvgTotalEmissions, ia.IncidentCount, ia.TotalIncidentDuration, af.NonCompliantAudits, ss.AvgEnergyEfficiency, ss.RenewableRatio
ORDER BY eh.AvgTotalEmissions DESC, ia.IncidentCount DESC, af.NonCompliantAudits DESC
LIMIT 46;

WITH EnvironmentalHistory AS (
    -- Анализ выбросов за последний год
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions + e.SO2Emissions + e.NOxEmissions + e.ParticulateMatter) AS AvgTotalEmissions
    FROM Emission e
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY e.PlantID
), 
IncidentAnalysis AS (
    -- Инцидентность на станциях за последний год
    SELECT 
        i.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        SUM(i.DurationHours) AS TotalIncidentDuration
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY i.PlantID
), 
AuditFindings AS (
    -- Аудиторы выявили проблемы за последний год
    SELECT 
        a.PlantID,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,
        SUM(CASE WHEN a.ComplianceStatus != 'Соблюдено' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NonCompliantAudits
    FROM `Audit` a
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY a.PlantID
), 
StationEnvironmentScore AS (
    -- Итоговая оценка сложности экологии по каждому объекту
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        pp.Name AS PlantName,
        AVG(AvgTotalEmissions) AS EmissionsScore,
        AVG(IncidentCount) AS IncidentScore,
        AVG(NonCompliantAudits) AS AuditScore,
        AVG(TotalIncidentDuration) AS IncidentDurationScore
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    LEFT JOIN EnvironmentalHistory eh ON pp.PlantID = eh.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN IncidentAnalysis ia ON pp.PlantID = ia.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN AuditFindings af ON pp.PlantID = af.PlantID
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.Name
), 
OwnerCompaniesWithComplexEnvironment AS (
    -- Суммируем оценки всех принадлежащих станций владельцу
    SELECT 
        oc.CompanyID,
        oc.Name AS CompanyName,
        SUM(EmissionsScore) AS TotalEmissionsScore,
        SUM(IncidentScore) AS TotalIncidentScore,
        SUM(AuditScore) AS TotalAuditScore,
        SUM(IncidentDurationScore) AS TotalIncidentDurationScore
    FROM OwnerCompany oc
    JOIN PowerPlant pp ON oc.CompanyID = pp.OwnerCompanyID
    JOIN StationEnvironmentScore ses ON pp.PlantID = ses.PlantID
    GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name
)
-- Финальный результат: Топ-46 владельцев с самой сложной экологической ситуацией
SELECT *
FROM OwnerCompaniesWithComplexEnvironment
ORDER BY TotalEmissionsScore DESC, TotalIncidentScore DESC, TotalAuditScore DESC
LIMIT 46;

queries.question: Найти топ-47 электростанций с наиболее сложной системой технического обслуживания за последний год, анализируя затраты, длительность ремонтов, влияние на производительность и стратегические возможности модернизации.
queries.sql_query: WITH PlantMaintenanceAnalysis AS (  SELECT  p.PlantID,  p.Name AS PlantName,  p.Type AS PlantType,  COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,  SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,  AVG(m.Cost) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,  AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,  MAX(m.Date) AS LastMaintenanceDate  FROM PowerPlant p  JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID  WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)  GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type  ),  PlantPerformanceImpact AS (  SELECT  p.PlantID,  COUNT(DISTINCT i.IncidentID) AS MaintenanceRelatedIncidents,  AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration,  SUM(i.DurationHours) AS TotalDowntimeHours  FROM PowerPlant p  JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID  JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID  WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)  AND i.Date >= m.Date  GROUP BY p.PlantID  ),  PlantAuditRecommendations AS (  SELECT  p.PlantID,  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.Recommendations) AS MaintenanceRecommendations,  MAX(a.Date) AS LastAuditDate  FROM PowerPlant p  JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID  WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)  GROUP BY p.PlantID  )  SELECT  pma.PlantName,  pma.PlantType,  pma.MaintenanceCount,  pma.TotalMaintenanceCost,  pma.AvgMaintenanceCost,  pma.AvgMaintenanceDuration,  ppi.MaintenanceRelatedIncidents,  ppi.AvgIncidentDuration,  ppi.TotalDowntimeHours,  pra.MaintenanceRecommendations  FROM PlantMaintenanceAnalysis pma  JOIN PlantPerformanceImpact ppi ON pma.PlantID = ppi.PlantID  JOIN PlantAuditRecommendations pra ON pma.PlantID = pra.PlantID  ORDER BY pma.TotalMaintenanceCost DESC, ppi.TotalDowntimeHours DESC  LIMIT 47;

WITH MaintenanceAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        MAX(m.Date) AS LastMaintenanceDate
    FROM Maintenance m
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY m.PlantID
),
IncidentAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        i.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentCount,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY i.PlantID
),
PlantUpgradePotential AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        p.CapacityMW,
        oc.Name AS OwnerCompanyName,
        ma.MaintenanceCount,
        ma.TotalMaintenanceCost,
        ma.AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        ma.LastMaintenanceDate,
        ia.IncidentCount,
        ia.CriticalIncidentCount,
        ia.AvgIncidentDuration,
        CASE 
            WHEN ia.CriticalIncidentCount > 2 THEN 'Высокий потенциал для модернизации'
            WHEN ma.TotalMaintenanceCost > 10000 THEN 'Средний потенциал для модернизации'
            ELSE 'Низкий потенциал для модернизации'
        END AS UpgradePotential
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    LEFT JOIN MaintenanceAnalysis ma ON p.PlantID = ma.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN IncidentAnalysis ia ON p.PlantID = ia.PlantID
)

WITH PowerPlantMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        pp.Name AS PlantName,
        pp.Type AS PlantType,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        MAX(m.Cost) AS MaxMaintenanceCost,
        MIN(m.Cost) AS MinMaintenanceCost,
        AVG(m.Cost) AS AvgMaintenanceCost
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Maintenance m ON pp.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.Name, pp.Type
),
PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID
),
PlantPerformance AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        pp.CapacityMW AS InstalledCapacity,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions,
        AVG(e.ParticulateMatter) AS AvgParticulateMatter
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.CapacityMW
),
PlantModernization AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaintenanceID) AS ModernizationCount,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS ModernizationCost
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    JOIN Maintenance m ON pp.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND m.Description LIKE '%модернизации%'
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID
)
SELECT 
    ppm.PlantName,
    ppm.PlantType,
    ppm.TotalMaintenanceCost,
    ppm.MaintenanceCount,
    ppm.AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    ppm.MaxMaintenanceCost,
    ppm.MinMaintenanceCost,
    ppm.AvgMaintenanceCost,
    pi.TotalIncidentsCount,
    pi.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    pi.LastIncidentDate,
    pi.AvgIncidentDuration,
    ppf.InstalledCapacity,
    ppf.AvgCO2Emissions,
    ppf.AvgSO2Emissions,
    ppf.AvgNOxEmissions,
    ppf.AvgParticulateMatter,
    pm.ModernizationCount,
    pm.ModernizationCost,
    CASE 
        WHEN ppm.MaxMaintenanceCost > 1000000 THEN 'Высокая сложность'
        WHEN ppm.MaxMaintenanceCost > 500000 THEN 'Средняя сложность'
        ELSE 'Низкая сложность'
    END AS ComplexityLevel
FROM PowerPlantMaintenance ppm
JOIN PlantIncidents pi ON ppm.PlantID = pi.PlantID
JOIN PlantPerformance ppf ON ppm.PlantID = ppf.PlantID
JOIN PlantModernization pm ON ppm.PlantID = pm.PlantID
ORDER BY ppm.MaxMaintenanceCost DESC, ppm.TotalMaintenanceCost DESC
LIMIT 47;

WITH PlantMaintenanceAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        p.CapacityMW,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        MAX(m.NextScheduledDate) AS NextMaintenanceDate
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type, p.CapacityMW
),
IncidentAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
EmissionAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
ContractAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(c.ContractID) AS ActiveContractsCount,

    WHERE c.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
)
