    ia.AvgIncidentDuration,
    ea.AvgCO2Emissions,
    ea.AvgSO2Emissions,
    ea.AvgNOxEmissions,
    ca.ActiveContractsCount,
    ca.TotalContractVolume,
    CASE 
        WHEN ia.CriticalIncidentsCount > 2 THEN 'Критический уровень рисков'
        WHEN ia.CriticalIncidentsCount > 0 THEN 'Высокий уровень рисков'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень рисков'
    END AS RiskLevel,
    CASE 
        WHEN pma.TotalMaintenanceCost > 1000000 THEN 'Высокая стоимость обслуживания'
        WHEN pma.TotalMaintenanceCost > 500000 THEN 'Средняя стоимость обслуживания'
        ELSE 'Низкая стоимость обслуживания'
    END AS MaintenanceCostLevel
FROM PlantMaintenanceAnalysis pma
JOIN IncidentAnalysis ia ON pma.PlantID = ia.PlantID
JOIN EmissionAnalysis ea ON pma.PlantID = ea.PlantID
JOIN ContractAnalysis ca ON pma.PlantID = ca.PlantID
ORDER BY pma.TotalMaintenanceCost DESC, ia.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC
LIMIT 47;

WITH ComplexMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        pp.Name AS PlantName,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        SUM(m.DurationHours) AS TotalMaintenanceDuration,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,
        AVG(a.FollowUpDate - a.Date) AS AvgAuditResolutionTime
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON pp.PlantID = m.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
      AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
      AND a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.Name
),
StrategicOpportunities AS (
    SELECT 
        cm.PlantID,
        cm.PlantName,
        cm.TotalMaintenanceCost,
        cm.TotalMaintenanceDuration,
        cm.IncidentCount,
        cm.AvgIncidentDuration,
        cm.AuditCount,
        cm.AvgAuditResolutionTime,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY cm.TotalMaintenanceCost + cm.TotalMaintenanceDuration + cm.IncidentCount DESC) AS ComplexityRank
    FROM ComplexMaintenance cm
)
SELECT 
    so.PlantName,
    so.TotalMaintenanceCost,
    so.TotalMaintenanceDuration,
    so.IncidentCount,
    so.AvgIncidentDuration,
    so.AuditCount,
    so.AvgAuditResolutionTime,
    so.ComplexityRank
FROM StrategicOpportunities so
WHERE so.ComplexityRank <= 47
ORDER BY so.ComplexityRank ASC;

queries.question: Найти топ-48 потребителей с наиболее сложными финансово-энергетическими профилями за последний год, анализируя паттерны потребления, тарифные планы, контракты и потенциал для оптимизации энергозатрат.
queries.sql_query:
WITH ConsumerConsumptionAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS TotalMetersCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS MeterTypesCount,
        AVG(m.LastReading) AS AvgConsumption,
        STDDEV(m.LastReading) AS ConsumptionVariability
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.LastReadingDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.ConsumptionPattern
),
ConsumerContractAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ActiveContractsCount,
        SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.Name) AS TariffNames
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Tariff t ON t.ConsumerType = c.Type
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
ConsumerFinancialImpact AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        SUM(ct.Volume * ct.PricePerUnit) AS EstimatedAnnualCost,
        AVG(t.PricePerUnit) AS AvgTariffPrice
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    JOIN Tariff t ON t.ConsumerType = c.Type
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
)
SELECT 
    cca.ConsumerName,
    cca.ConsumerType,
    cca.ConsumptionPattern,
    cca.TotalMetersCount,
    cca.MeterTypesCount,
    ROUND(cca.AvgConsumption, 2) AS AvgConsumption,
    ROUND(cca.ConsumptionVariability, 2) AS ConsumptionVariability,
    cct.TariffNames,
    cct.ActiveContractsCount,
    ROUND(cct.TotalContractVolume, 2) AS TotalContractVolume,
    ROUND(cfi.EstimatedAnnualCost, 2) AS EstimatedAnnualCost,
    ROUND(cfi.AvgTariffPrice, 2) AS AvgTariffPrice,
    CASE 
        WHEN cca.ConsumptionVariability > cca.AvgConsumption * 0.5 THEN 'Критическая финансовая нестабильность'
        WHEN cca.ConsumptionVariability > cca.AvgConsumption * 0.3 THEN 'Высокая финансовая нестабильность'
        WHEN cca.ConsumptionVariability > cca.AvgConsumption * 0.2 THEN 'Средняя финансовая нестабильность'
        ELSE 'Низкая финансовая нестабильность'
    END AS FinancialStability
FROM ConsumerConsumptionAnalysis cca
JOIN ConsumerContractAnalysis cct ON cca.ConsumerID = cct.ConsumerID
JOIN ConsumerFinancialImpact cfi ON cca.ConsumerID = cfi.ConsumerID
ORDER BY cca.ConsumptionVariability DESC, cfi.EstimatedAnnualCost DESC
LIMIT 48;

    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,

        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        t.Name AS TariffName,
        t.PricePerUnit AS TariffRate,
        t.PeakHours,
        t.OffPeakHours,
        ct.ContractID,
        ct.StartDate AS ContractStartDate,
        ct.EndDate AS ContractEndDate,
        ct.PricePerUnit AS ContractRate,
        ct.Volume AS ContractVolume,
        ct.Status AS ContractStatus,
        ct.RenewalOption,
        m.MeterID,
        m.Type AS MeterType,
        m.LastReading,
        m.LastReadingDate,
        m.Status AS MeterStatus,
        CASE 
            WHEN c.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%высокий%' THEN 3
            WHEN c.ConsumptionPattern LIKE '%средний%' THEN 2
            ELSE 1
        END AS ConsumptionComplexity,
        CASE 
            WHEN ct.PricePerUnit > t.PricePerUnit THEN 2
            ELSE 1
        END AS RateDiscrepancy,
        CASE 
            WHEN ct.Status = 'active' AND ct.EndDate < DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) THEN 2
            ELSE 1
        END AS ContractRenewalUrgency,
        CASE 
            WHEN m.Status != 'Активен' THEN 2
            ELSE 1
        END AS MeterIssues
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Tariff t ON c.Type LIKE CONCAT('%', t.ConsumerType, '%')
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
       OR ct.Status = 'active'
),
ConsumerScores AS (
    SELECT 
        ConsumerID,
        ConsumerName,
        ConsumerType,
        Location,
        AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        ConsumptionPattern,
        TariffName,
        TariffRate,
        PeakHours,
        OffPeakHours,
        ContractID,
        ContractStartDate,
        ContractEndDate,
        ContractRate,
        ContractVolume,
        ContractStatus,
        RenewalOption,
        MeterID,
        MeterType,
        LastReading,
        LastReadingDate,
        MeterStatus,
        (ConsumptionComplexity + RateDiscrepancy + ContractRenewalUrgency + MeterIssues) AS ComplexityScore
    FROM ConsumerAnalysis
)

WITH ComplexConsumerAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.Location,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        m.MeterID,
        m.Type AS MeterType,
        m.Status AS MeterStatus,
        t.TariffID,
        t.Name AS TariffName,
        t.PricePerUnit AS TariffPrice,
        ct.ContractID,
        ct.Status AS ContractStatus,
        ct.PricePerUnit AS ContractPrice,
        ct.Volume AS ContractVolume,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY 
            c.AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC, 
            t.PricePerUnit DESC, 
            (ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) DESC) AS ComplexityRank
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID AND ct.Status = 'active'
    LEFT JOIN Tariff t ON 1=1
    WHERE 
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption > (SELECT AVG(AverageMonthlyConsumption) FROM Consumer)
)

    ROUND(AverageMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS MonthlyConsumption,

    ContractID,
    ContractStatus,
    ROUND(ContractPrice, 4) AS ContractPrice,
    ROUND(ContractVolume, 2) AS ContractVolume,
    ROUND((TariffPrice * AverageMonthlyConsumption) - (ContractPrice * ContractVolume), 2) AS PotentialSavings,

FROM ComplexConsumerAnalysis

        con.Terms AS ContractTerms,
        con.PricePerUnit AS ContractPricePerUnit,
        con.Volume AS ContractVolume,
        met.LastReading AS LatestMeterReading,
        met.LastReadingDate AS LatestMeterReadingDate,
        met.Status AS MeterStatus,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.ConsumerID ORDER BY met.LastReadingDate DESC) AS ReadingRank
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` con ON c.ConsumerID = con.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Tariff tar ON con.TariffID = tar.TariffID
    LEFT JOIN Meter met ON c.ConsumerID = met.ConsumerID
    WHERE con.EndDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
      AND met.InstallationDate <= CURRENT_DATE
), RankedComplexEnergyProfiles AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM ComplexEnergyProfiles
    WHERE ReadingRank = 1 -- Only consider latest meter reading per consumer
)
SELECT 
    ConsumerID,
    ConsumerName,
    ConsumerType,
    ConsumerLocation,
    ContactName,
    ContactPhone,
    ContactEmail,
    ConsumptionPattern,
    AverageMonthlyConsumption,
    TariffName,
    TariffDescription,
    TariffPricePerUnit,
    PeakHours,
    OffPeakHours,
    ContractID,
    ContractStartDate,
    ContractEndDate,
    ContractTerms,
    ContractPricePerUnit,
    ContractVolume,
    LatestMeterReading,
    LatestMeterReadingDate,
    MeterStatus
FROM RankedComplexEnergyProfiles
ORDER BY AverageMonthlyConsumption DESC, ContractVolume DESC
LIMIT 48;
queries.gigachat_response_ru:
WITH ComplexProfiles AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Location,
        c.ContactName,
        c.ContactPhone,
        c.ContactEmail,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        t.TariffID,
        t.Name AS TariffName,
        t.PricePerUnit,
        t.PeakHours,
        t.OffPeakHours,
        cr.ContractID,
        cr.StartDate,
        cr.EndDate,
        cr.Terms,
        cr.PricePerUnit AS ContractPricePerUnit,
        cr.Volume AS ContractVolume,
        cr.Status AS ContractStatus,
        m.LastReading,
        m.LastReadingDate,
        m.Status AS MeterStatus,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.ConsumerID ORDER BY m.LastReadingDate DESC) AS ReadingRank
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` cr ON c.ConsumerID = cr.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Tariff t ON cr.TariffID = t.TariffID
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE cr.EndDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
      AND m.LastReadingDate IS NOT NULL
), RankedReadings AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM ComplexProfiles
    WHERE ReadingRank = 1
), ComplexityScore AS (
    SELECT 
        r.ConsumerID,
        r.ConsumerName,
        r.Location,
        r.ContactName,
        r.ContactPhone,
        r.ContactEmail,
        r.ConsumptionPattern,
        r.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        r.TariffName,
        r.PricePerUnit,
        r.PeakHours,
        r.OffPeakHours,
        r.ContractID,
        r.StartDate,
        r.EndDate,
        r.Terms,
        r.ContractPricePerUnit,
        r.ContractVolume,
        r.ContractStatus,
        r.LastReading,
        r.LastReadingDate,
        r.MeterStatus,
        -- Сложность рассчитывается на основе нескольких факторов:
        -- 1. Объем потребления
        -- 2. Тип тарифа (например, пиковые часы)
        -- 3. Цена контракта
        -- 4. Текущий статус счетчика
        -- Чем больше значение, тем сложнее профиль потребителя
        ((r.AverageMonthlyConsumption / 1000) + 
         (CASE WHEN LOCATE('пик', LOWER(r.PeakHours)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) +
         (r.ContractPricePerUnit / 10) +
         (CASE WHEN r.MeterStatus <> 'Активен' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) AS ComplexityScore
    FROM RankedReadings r
)
SELECT *
FROM ComplexityScore
ORDER BY ComplexityScore DESC
LIMIT 48;

queries.question: Найти топ-49 линий электропередачи с наиболее сложной системой управления за последние 3 месяца, анализируя инциденты, нагрузку, обслуживание и подключенные подстанции, с оценкой потенциальных рисков и эффективности инфраструктуры.
queries.sql_query:
WITH TransmissionLineIncidentAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        tl.Name AS LineName,
        tl.VoltageLevel,
        tl.LengthKM,
        tl.CapacityMW,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    JOIN Incident i ON 1=1
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY tl.LineID, tl.Name, tl.VoltageLevel, tl.LengthKM, tl.CapacityMW
),
TransmissionLineMaintenanceAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    JOIN Maintenance m ON 1=1
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY tl.LineID
),
TransmissionLineConnectionAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.SubstationID) AS ConnectedSubstationsCount,
        SUM(s.CapacityMW) AS TotalSubstationCapacity,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.ConsumerID) AS IndustrialConsumersCount,
        SUM(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    JOIN Substation s ON tl.LineID = s.SubstationID
    JOIN Consumer c ON 1=1
    WHERE c.Type = 'Промышленность'
    GROUP BY tl.LineID
)
SELECT 
    tli.LineName,
    tli.VoltageLevel,
    ROUND(tli.LengthKM, 2) AS LengthKM,
    ROUND(tli.CapacityMW, 2) AS CapacityMW,
    tli.TotalIncidentsCount,
    tli.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    ROUND(tli.AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    tlma.TotalMaintenanceCost,
    tlma.MaintenanceCount,
    ROUND(tlma.AvgMaintenanceDuration, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    tlca.ConnectedSubstationsCount,
    ROUND(tlca.TotalSubstationCapacity, 2) AS TotalSubstationCapacity,
    tlca.IndustrialConsumersCount,
    ROUND(tlca.TotalIndustrialConsumption, 2) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption,
    CASE 
        WHEN tli.CriticalIncidentsCount > 3 THEN 'Критический уровень сложности управления'
        WHEN tli.CriticalIncidentsCount > 1 THEN 'Высокий уровень сложности управления'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень сложности управления'
    END AS ManagementComplexityLevel
FROM TransmissionLineIncidentAnalysis tli
JOIN TransmissionLineMaintenanceAnalysis tlma ON tli.LineID = tlma.LineID
JOIN TransmissionLineConnectionAnalysis tlca ON tli.LineID = tlca.LineID
ORDER BY tli.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, tlma.TotalMaintenanceCost DESC
LIMIT 49;

WITH TransmissionLineAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        tl.Name AS LineName,
        tl.VoltageLevel,
        tl.LengthKM,
        tl.CapacityMW,
        COUNT(DISTINCT i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        SUM(i.DurationHours) AS TotalIncidentDuration,
        AVG(i.Severity = 'Критическая') AS CriticalIncidentRatio,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.SubstationID) AS SubstationCount
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON tl.LineID = i.PlantID AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON tl.LineID = m.PlantID AND m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    LEFT JOIN Substation s ON tl.OwnerCompanyID = s.OwnerCompanyID
    GROUP BY tl.LineID, tl.Name, tl.VoltageLevel, tl.LengthKM, tl.CapacityMW
),
RiskAssessment AS (
    SELECT 
        LineID,
        LineName,
        VoltageLevel,
        LengthKM,
        CapacityMW,
        IncidentCount,
        TotalIncidentDuration,
        CriticalIncidentRatio,
        TotalMaintenanceCost,
        AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        SubstationCount,
        (IncidentCount * 0.4 + CriticalIncidentRatio * 0.3 + TotalMaintenanceCost * 0.2 + AvgMaintenanceDuration * 0.1) AS ComplexityScore,
        CASE
            WHEN IncidentCount > 5 OR CriticalIncidentRatio > 0.5 THEN 'Высокий риск'
            WHEN IncidentCount > 2 OR CriticalIncidentRatio > 0.2 THEN 'Средний риск'
            ELSE 'Низкий риск'
        END AS PotentialRisk,
        CASE
            WHEN CapacityMW / LengthKM > 1 THEN 'Высокая эффективность'
            WHEN CapacityMW / LengthKM > 0.5 THEN 'Средняя эффективность'
            ELSE 'Низкая эффективность'
        END AS InfrastructureEfficiency
    FROM TransmissionLineAnalysis
)
SELECT 
    LineName,
    VoltageLevel,
    LengthKM,
    CapacityMW,
    IncidentCount,
    TotalIncidentDuration,
    CriticalIncidentRatio,
    TotalMaintenanceCost,
    AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    SubstationCount,
    ComplexityScore,
    PotentialRisk,
    InfrastructureEfficiency
FROM RiskAssessment
ORDER BY ComplexityScore DESC
LIMIT 49;

WITH TransmissionLineIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        tl.Name AS LineName,
        tl.VoltageLevel,
        tl.LengthKM,
        tl.CapacityMW,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON tl.LineID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH) OR i.Date IS NULL
    GROUP BY tl.LineID, tl.Name, tl.VoltageLevel, tl.LengthKM, tl.CapacityMW
),
LineMaintenanceAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON tl.LineID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) OR m.Date IS NULL
    GROUP BY tl.LineID
),
LineConnections AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.SubstationID) AS ConnectedSubstationsCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.ConsumerID) AS IndustrialConsumersCount,
        SUM(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    LEFT JOIN Substation s ON tl.LineID = s.SubstationID
    LEFT JOIN Consumer c ON tl.LineID = c.ConsumerID
    WHERE c.Type = 'Промышленность' OR c.Type IS NULL
    GROUP BY tl.LineID
),
LineLoadAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        AVG(tl.CapacityMW - (SELECT AVG(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) FROM Consumer c WHERE c.ConsumerID = tl.LineID)) AS AvgAvailableCapacity
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    GROUP BY tl.LineID
)
SELECT 
    tli.LineName,
    tli.VoltageLevel,
    ROUND(tli.LengthKM, 2) AS LengthKM,
    ROUND(tli.CapacityMW, 2) AS CapacityMW,
    tli.TotalIncidentsCount,
    tli.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    ROUND(tli.AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    ROUND(lma.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    lma.MaintenanceCount,
    ROUND(lma.AvgMaintenanceDuration, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    lc.ConnectedSubstationsCount,
    lc.IndustrialConsumersCount,
    ROUND(lc.TotalIndustrialConsumption, 2) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption,
    ROUND(lla.AvgAvailableCapacity, 2) AS AvgAvailableCapacity,
    CASE 
        WHEN tli.CriticalIncidentsCount > 2 THEN 'Критический уровень рисков'
        WHEN tli.CriticalIncidentsCount > 0 THEN 'Высокий уровень рисков'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень рисков'
    END AS RiskLevel,
    CASE 
        WHEN lma.TotalMaintenanceCost > 1000000 THEN 'Высокая стоимость обслуживания'
        WHEN lma.TotalMaintenanceCost > 500000 THEN 'Средняя стоимость обслуживания'
        ELSE 'Низкая стоимость обслуживания'
    END AS MaintenanceCostLevel
FROM TransmissionLineIncidents tli
JOIN LineMaintenanceAnalysis lma ON tli.LineID = lma.LineID
JOIN LineConnections lc ON tli.LineID = lc.LineID
JOIN LineLoadAnalysis lla ON tli.LineID = lla.LineID
ORDER BY tli.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, tli.TotalIncidentsCount DESC
LIMIT 49;

    lla.AvgConsumerConsumption,
    CASE 
        WHEN tli.CriticalIncidentsCount > 0 OR lm.MaintenanceCount > 5 THEN 'Высокий риск'
        WHEN tli.TotalIncidentsCount > 3 OR lm.MaintenanceCount > 3 THEN 'Средний риск'
        ELSE 'Низкий риск'
    END AS RiskLevel,
    CASE 
        WHEN tli.TotalIncidentsCount = 0 AND lm.MaintenanceCount = 0 THEN 'Высокая эффективность'
        WHEN tli.TotalIncidentsCount <= 2 AND lm.MaintenanceCount <= 2 THEN 'Средняя эффективность'
        ELSE 'Низкая эффективность'
    END AS EfficiencyLevel
FROM TransmissionLineIncidents tli
JOIN LineMaintenance lm ON tli.LineID = lm.LineID
JOIN LineLoadAnalysis lla ON tli.LineID = lla.LineID
ORDER BY tli.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, tli.TotalIncidentsCount DESC, lm.MaintenanceCount DESC
LIMIT 49;

WITH TransmissionLineComplexity AS (
    SELECT 
        tl.LineID,
        tl.Name AS LineName,
        tl.VoltageLevel,
        tl.LengthKM,
        tl.CapacityMW,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.SubstationID) AS ConnectedSubstationsCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.ConsumerID) AS IndustrialConsumersCount,
        SUM(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption
    FROM TransmissionLine tl
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON tl.LineID = i.PlantID AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON tl.LineID = m.PlantID AND m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    LEFT JOIN Substation s ON tl.LineID = s.SubstationID
    LEFT JOIN Consumer c ON s.SubstationID = c.ConsumerID AND c.Type = 'Промышленность'
    GROUP BY tl.LineID, tl.Name, tl.VoltageLevel, tl.LengthKM, tl.CapacityMW
)
SELECT 
    LineName,
    VoltageLevel,
    ROUND(LengthKM, 2) AS LengthKM,
    ROUND(CapacityMW, 2) AS CapacityMW,
    TotalIncidentsCount,
    CriticalIncidentsCount,
    ROUND(AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    ROUND(TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    MaintenanceCount,
    ROUND(AVG(AvgMaintenanceDuration), 2) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    ConnectedSubstationsCount,
    IndustrialConsumersCount,
    ROUND(TotalIndustrialConsumption, 2) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption,
    CASE 
        WHEN CriticalIncidentsCount > 2 THEN 'Критический уровень риска'
        WHEN CriticalIncidentsCount > 0 THEN 'Высокий уровень риска'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень риска'
    END AS RiskLevel
FROM TransmissionLineComplexity
ORDER BY CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, TotalIncidentsCount DESC
LIMIT 49;

queries.question: Найти топ-17 подстанций с наибольшим количеством подключенных промышленных потребителей и высокой нагрузкой за последний квартал, и показать для каждой подстанции информацию о типе потребителей, среднем потреблении, стоимости обслуживания и количестве инцидентов.
queries.sql_query:
WITH SubstationLoad AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        s.Name AS SubstationName,
        s.CapacityMW,
        COUNT(DISTINCT tl.LineID) AS ConnectedLinesCount,
        SUM(tl.CapacityMW) AS TotalLineCapacity
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN TransmissionLine tl ON s.SubstationID = tl.LineID
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID, s.Name, s.CapacityMW
),
IndustrialConsumers AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.ConsumerID) AS IndustrialConsumersCount,
        AVG(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS AvgConsumption,
        SUM(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS TotalConsumption
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN Consumer c ON 1=1
    WHERE c.Type = 'Промышленность'
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
),
SubstationIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS IncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        MAX(i.Severity) AS LastIncidentSeverity
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN Incident i ON 1=1
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
),
SubstationMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        AVG(m.Cost) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN Maintenance m ON 1=1
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
)
SELECT 
    sl.SubstationName,
    ROUND(sl.CapacityMW, 2) AS CapacityMW,
    sl.ConnectedLinesCount,
    ROUND(sl.TotalLineCapacity, 2) AS TotalLineCapacity,
    ic.IndustrialConsumersCount,
    ROUND(ic.AvgConsumption, 2) AS AvgConsumption,
    ROUND(ic.TotalConsumption, 2) AS TotalConsumption,
    si.IncidentsCount,
    si.LastIncidentSeverity,
    ROUND(sm.AvgMaintenanceCost, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceCost,
    ROUND(sm.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    sm.MaintenanceCount,
    CASE 
        WHEN ic.TotalConsumption > sl.CapacityMW * 0.8 THEN 'Высокая нагрузка'
        WHEN ic.TotalConsumption > sl.CapacityMW * 0.5 THEN 'Средняя нагрузка'
        ELSE 'Низкая нагрузка'
    END AS LoadLevel
FROM SubstationLoad sl
JOIN IndustrialConsumers ic ON sl.SubstationID = ic.SubstationID
JOIN SubstationIncidents si ON sl.SubstationID = si.SubstationID
JOIN SubstationMaintenance sm ON sl.SubstationID = sm.SubstationID
ORDER BY ic.IndustrialConsumersCount DESC, ic.TotalConsumption DESC
LIMIT 17;

queries.question: Найти топ-26 электростанций с наибольшим количеством критических инцидентов за последние 3 месяца, которые имеют проблемы с экологическими нормами, и показать для каждой станции информацию о последних аудиторских проверках, затратах на обслуживание и количестве действующих контрактов.
queries.sql_query:
WITH PlantIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity IN ('Высокая', 'Критическая') THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type
),
PlantCompliance AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN e.ComplianceStatus = 'Не соответствует' THEN 1 END) AS NonComplianceCount,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgEmissions
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
PlantAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        a.Auditor,
        a.Recommendations,
        a.ComplianceStatus,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.PlantID ORDER BY a.Date DESC) AS rn
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
),
PlantMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
PlantContracts AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ActiveContractsCount,
        SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON 1=1
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
)
SELECT 
    pi.PlantName,
    pi.PlantType,
    pi.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    pc.NonComplianceCount,
    ROUND(pc.AvgEmissions, 2) AS AvgEmissions,
    pa.Auditor AS LastAuditor,
    pa.Recommendations AS LastAuditRecommendations,
    ROUND(pm.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    pm.MaintenanceCount,
    pct.ActiveContractsCount,
    ROUND(pct.TotalContractVolume, 2) AS TotalContractVolume,
    CASE 
        WHEN pi.CriticalIncidentsCount > 3 THEN 'Критический уровень инцидентов'
        WHEN pi.CriticalIncidentsCount > 1 THEN 'Высокий уровень инцидентов'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень инцидентов'
    END AS IncidentLevel
FROM PlantIncidents pi
JOIN PlantCompliance pc ON pi.PlantID = pc.PlantID
JOIN PlantAudits pa ON pi.PlantID = pa.PlantID AND pa.rn = 1
JOIN PlantMaintenance pm ON pi.PlantID = pm.PlantID
JOIN PlantContracts pct ON pi.PlantID = pct.PlantID
ORDER BY pi.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, pc.NonComplianceCount DESC
LIMIT 26;

WITH CriticalIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        i.PlantID,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS CriticalIncidentCount
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Severity = 'Критическая' AND i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY i.PlantID
),
NonCompliantEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID
    FROM Emission e
    WHERE e.ComplianceStatus != 'Соответствует' AND e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY e.PlantID
),
TopPlants AS (
    SELECT 
        ci.PlantID,
        ci.CriticalIncidentCount
    FROM CriticalIncidents ci
    JOIN NonCompliantEmissions nce ON ci.PlantID = nce.PlantID
    ORDER BY ci.CriticalIncidentCount DESC
    LIMIT 26
),
LatestAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        a.PlantID,

        a.Auditor,
        a.Findings,

    FROM `Audit` a

),
MaintenanceCosts AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost
    FROM Maintenance m
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY m.PlantID
),
ActiveContracts AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        COUNT(c.ContractID) AS ActiveContractCount
    FROM `Contract` c
    WHERE c.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
)
SELECT 
    pp.Name AS PlantName,
    pp.Location,
    pp.CapacityMW,
    pp.Type AS PlantType,
    tp.CriticalIncidentCount,
    la.AuditDate,
    la.Auditor,
    la.Findings,
    la.Recommendations,
    la.ComplianceStatus AS AuditComplianceStatus,
    mc.TotalMaintenanceCost,

FROM TopPlants tp
JOIN PowerPlant pp ON tp.PlantID = pp.PlantID
LEFT JOIN LatestAudits la ON tp.PlantID = la.PlantID
LEFT JOIN MaintenanceCosts mc ON tp.PlantID = mc.PlantID
LEFT JOIN ActiveContracts ac ON pp.OwnerCompanyID = ac.ConsumerID
ORDER BY tp.CriticalIncidentCount DESC;

WITH RecentCriticalIncidents AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        COUNT(*) AS CriticalIncidentCount
    FROM Incident
    WHERE Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    AND Severity = 'Критическая'
    GROUP BY PlantID
),
EmissionIssues AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID
    FROM Emission
    WHERE Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    AND ComplianceStatus <> 'Соответствует'
),
RelevantPlants AS (
    SELECT
        rci.PlantID,
        rci.CriticalIncidentCount
    FROM RecentCriticalIncidents rci
    JOIN EmissionIssues ei ON rci.PlantID = ei.PlantID
),
RankedPlants AS (
    SELECT
        PlantID,
        CriticalIncidentCount,
        RANK() OVER (ORDER BY CriticalIncidentCount DESC) AS Rank
    FROM RelevantPlants
)
SELECT
    pp.Name AS PlantName,
    rp.CriticalIncidentCount,
    a.Date AS LastAuditDate,
    a.Auditor AS LastAuditor,
    a.Findings AS LastAuditFindings,
    m.Cost AS LastMaintenanceCost,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.ContractID) AS ActiveContractCount
FROM RankedPlants rp
JOIN PowerPlant pp ON rp.PlantID = pp.PlantID
LEFT JOIN `Audit` a ON pp.PlantID = a.PlantID AND a.Date = (SELECT MAX(Date) FROM `Audit` WHERE PlantID = pp.PlantID)
LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON pp.PlantID = m.PlantID AND m.Date = (SELECT MAX(Date) FROM Maintenance WHERE PlantID = pp.PlantID)
LEFT JOIN `Contract` c ON pp.PlantID = c.ConsumerID  
WHERE rp.Rank <= 26
GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.Name, rp.CriticalIncidentCount, a.Date, a.Auditor, a.Findings, m.Cost
ORDER BY rp.CriticalIncidentCount DESC
LIMIT 26;

JOIN CriticalIncidents ci ON p.PlantID = ci.PlantID
JOIN EnvironmentalIssues ei ON p.PlantID = ei.PlantID
JOIN PlantMaintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
JOIN PlantContracts c ON p.PlantID = c.PlantID
JOIN PlantAudits a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
ORDER BY ci.CriticalIncidentCount DESC
LIMIT 26;

    GROUP BY i.PlantID
),
EnvironmentallyNonCompliantPlants AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID
    FROM Emission e
    WHERE e.ComplianceStatus != 'Соответствует'

LatestAudits AS (

    FROM `Audit` a
    INNER JOIN (

        FROM `Audit`
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) la ON a.PlantID = la.PlantID AND a.Date = la.LatestAuditDate
),
MaintenanceCosts AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,

    FROM Maintenance m
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY m.PlantID
),
ActiveContracts AS (

        c.PlantID,
        COUNT(*) AS ActiveContractCount
    FROM `Contract` c
    WHERE c.Status = 'active'

FROM PowerPlant pp

INNER JOIN EnvironmentallyNonCompliantPlants encp ON pp.PlantID = encp.PlantID

queries.question: Найти топ-37 электростанций с наиболее сложной историей инцидентов за последний год, включая анализ типов инцидентов, их влияние на производственные показатели, стоимость обслуживания и рекомендации аудиторов.
queries.sql_query:
WITH PlantIncidentHistory AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Высокая' THEN 1 END) AS HighIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type
),
PlantMaintenanceImpact AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
LatestAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        a.Recommendations,
        a.ComplianceStatus,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.PlantID ORDER BY a.Date DESC) AS rn
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
)
SELECT 
    pih.PlantName,
    pih.PlantType,
    pih.TotalIncidentsCount,
    pih.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    pih.HighIncidentsCount,
    ROUND(pih.AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    ROUND(pmi.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    pmi.MaintenanceCount,
    ROUND(pmi.AvgMaintenanceDuration, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    la.Recommendations,
    la.ComplianceStatus,
    CASE 
        WHEN pih.CriticalIncidentsCount > 3 THEN 'Критический уровень рисков'
        WHEN pih.CriticalIncidentsCount > 1 THEN 'Высокий уровень рисков'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень рисков'
    END AS RiskLevel
FROM PlantIncidentHistory pih
JOIN PlantMaintenanceImpact pmi ON pih.PlantID = pmi.PlantID
JOIN LatestAudits la ON pih.PlantID = la.PlantID AND la.rn = 1
ORDER BY pih.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, pih.TotalIncidentsCount DESC
LIMIT 37;

    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),

    FROM PowerPlant p

    pi.MediumSeverityIncidents,
    pi.LowSeverityIncidents,
    ROUND(pi.AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    ROUND(pi.TotalDowntimeHours, 2) AS TotalDowntimeHours,
    pi.IncidentDescriptions,
    pi.IncidentImpacts,
    ROUND(pm.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    pm.MaintenanceCount,
    ROUND(pm.AvgMaintenanceDuration, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    pm.MaintenanceDescriptions,
    pa.AuditCount,
    pa.AuditFindings,
    pa.AuditRecommendations,
    pa.ComplianceStatuses,
    CASE 
        WHEN pi.CriticalIncidents > 0 THEN 'Критический уровень проблем'
        WHEN pi.HighSeverityIncidents > 2 THEN 'Высокий уровень проблем'
        WHEN pi.TotalIncidents > 5 THEN 'Повышенный уровень проблем'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень проблем'
    END AS ProblemLevel
FROM PlantIncidents pi
LEFT JOIN PlantMaintenance pm ON pi.PlantID = pm.PlantID
LEFT JOIN PlantAudits pa ON pi.PlantID = pa.PlantID
ORDER BY pi.CriticalIncidents DESC, pi.TotalIncidents DESC, pi.TotalDowntimeHours DESC
LIMIT 37;

        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Средняя' THEN 1 END) AS MediumSeverityIncidents,

        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate
    FROM PowerPlant p

    JOIN Incident i ON p.PlantID = i.PlantID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type, p.CapacityMW, oc.Name
),
PlantMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Maintenance m ON p.PlantID = m.PlantID
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
PlantAudits AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        COUNT(a.AuditID) AS AuditCount,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.Recommendations SEPARATOR '; ') AS AuditRecommendations,
        GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.Auditor SEPARATOR '; ') AS Auditors
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN `Audit` a ON p.PlantID = a.PlantID
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
),
PlantEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        p.PlantID,
        AVG(e.CO2Emissions) AS AvgCO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.SO2Emissions) AS AvgSO2Emissions,
        AVG(e.NOxEmissions) AS AvgNOxEmissions
    FROM PowerPlant p
    JOIN Emission e ON p.PlantID = e.PlantID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY p.PlantID
)

        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Высокая' THEN 1 END) AS HighSeverityIncidents,

        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Низкая' THEN 1 END) AS LowSeverityIncidents,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
        MIN(i.Date) AS FirstIncidentDate,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate
    FROM Incident i
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY i.PlantID
),
MaintenanceCosts AS (
    SELECT 
        m.PlantID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,

    FROM Maintenance m
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY m.PlantID
),
AuditRecommendations AS (

        a.PlantID,
        STRING_AGG(a.Findings, ', ') AS AuditFindings,
        STRING_AGG(a.Recommendations, ', ') AS AuditRecommendations
    FROM `Audit` a
    WHERE a.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY a.PlantID
)

FROM PowerPlant pp
LEFT JOIN IncidentDetails id ON pp.PlantID = id.PlantID
LEFT JOIN MaintenanceCosts mc ON pp.PlantID = mc.PlantID
LEFT JOIN AuditRecommendations ar ON pp.PlantID = ar.PlantID

queries.question: Найти топ-38 потребителей с наиболее сложными паттернами потребления за последний год, анализируя количество и типы счетчиков, вариативность потребления, стоимость контрактов и потенциал для оптимизации энергопотребления.
queries.sql_query:
WITH ConsumerMeterAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.ConsumptionPattern,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS TotalMetersCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS MeterTypesCount,
        MAX(m.LastReadingDate) AS LastReadingDate
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.LastReadingDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.ConsumptionPattern
),
ConsumptionVariability AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        STDDEV(m.LastReading) AS ConsumptionStdDev,
        MAX(m.LastReading) - MIN(m.LastReading) AS ConsumptionRange,
        AVG(m.LastReading) AS AvgConsumption
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.LastReadingDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
ContractAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
        SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ActiveContractsCount
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
)
SELECT 
    cma.ConsumerName,
    cma.ConsumerType,
    cma.ConsumptionPattern,
    cma.TotalMetersCount,
    cma.MeterTypesCount,
    ROUND(cv.AvgConsumption, 2) AS AvgConsumption,
    ROUND(cv.ConsumptionStdDev, 2) AS ConsumptionVariability,
    ROUND(cv.ConsumptionRange, 2) AS ConsumptionRange,
    ROUND(ca.AvgPricePerUnit, 2) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
    ROUND(ca.TotalContractVolume, 2) AS TotalContractVolume,
    ca.ActiveContractsCount,
    CASE 
        WHEN cv.ConsumptionStdDev > cv.AvgConsumption * 0.4 THEN 'Высокая нестабильность'
        WHEN cv.ConsumptionStdDev > cv.AvgConsumption * 0.2 THEN 'Средняя нестабильность'
        ELSE 'Низкая нестабильность'
    END AS ConsumptionStability
FROM ConsumerMeterAnalysis cma
JOIN ConsumptionVariability cv ON cma.ConsumerID = cv.ConsumerID
JOIN ContractAnalysis ca ON cma.ConsumerID = ca.ConsumerID
ORDER BY ConsumptionVariability DESC, TotalMetersCount DESC
LIMIT 38;

WITH ConsumerMeterAnalysis AS (
    SELECT
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.Location AS ConsumerLocation,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS MeterCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Type = 'Электрический' THEN 1 END) AS ElectricMeterCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Type = 'Газовый' THEN 1 END) AS GasMeterCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Type = 'Водяной' THEN 1 END) AS WaterMeterCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN m.Type = 'Тепловой' THEN 1 END) AS HeatMeterCount,
        AVG(m.LastReading) AS AvgLastReading
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.InstallationDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.Location
),
ContractCostAnalysis AS (
    SELECT
        c.ConsumerID,
        SUM(ct.PricePerUnit * ct.Volume) AS TotalContractCost,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ContractCount
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
ConsumptionPatternAnalysis AS (
    SELECT
        c.ConsumerID,
        AVG(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
        MAX(LENGTH(c.ConsumptionPattern)) AS ConsumptionPatternComplexity
    FROM Consumer c
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
TariffOptimizationPotential AS (
    SELECT
        c.ConsumerID,
        CASE
            WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT t.TariffID) > 1 THEN 'Высокий'
            WHEN AVG(t.PricePerUnit) > (SELECT AVG(PricePerUnit) FROM Tariff) THEN 'Средний'
            ELSE 'Низкий'
        END AS OptimizationPotential
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN Supplier s ON ct.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
    LEFT JOIN EnergySource es ON s.SourceID = es.SourceID
    LEFT JOIN Tariff t ON 1=1
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
)
SELECT
    cma.ConsumerName,
    cma.ConsumerType,
    cma.ConsumerLocation,
    cma.MeterCount,
    cma.ElectricMeterCount,
    cma.GasMeterCount,
    cma.WaterMeterCount,
    cma.HeatMeterCount,
    ROUND(cma.AvgLastReading, 2) AS AvgLastReading,
    ROUND(cca.TotalContractCost, 2) AS TotalContractCost,
    ROUND(cca.AvgPricePerUnit, 2) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
    cca.ContractCount,
    ROUND(cpa.AvgMonthlyConsumption, 2) AS AvgMonthlyConsumption,
    cpa.ConsumptionPatternComplexity,
    top.OptimizationPotential,
    (cma.MeterCount * 0.3 + cca.ContractCount * 0.2 + cpa.ConsumptionPatternComplexity * 0.5) AS ComplexityScore
FROM ConsumerMeterAnalysis cma
JOIN ContractCostAnalysis cca ON cma.ConsumerID = cca.ConsumerID
JOIN ConsumptionPatternAnalysis cpa ON cma.ConsumerID = cpa.ConsumerID
JOIN TariffOptimizationPotential top ON cma.ConsumerID = top.ConsumerID
ORDER BY ComplexityScore DESC
LIMIT 38;

WITH ConsumerPatterns AS (

        c.Location,
        c.ContactName,

        c.ContactEmail,

        MAX(m.LastReading) AS MaxLastReading,
        MIN(m.LastReading) AS MinLastReading,
        AVG(m.LastReading) AS AvgLastReading,
        STDEV(m.LastReading) AS StdDevLastReading
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.Location, c.ContactName, c.ContactPhone, c.ContactEmail, c.ConsumptionPattern, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
),
ContractAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        COUNT(ct.ContractID) AS ContractCount,

        MAX(ct.PricePerUnit) AS MaxContractPrice,
        MIN(ct.PricePerUnit) AS MinContractPrice,
        STDEV(ct.PricePerUnit) AS StdDevContractPrice
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
OptimizationPotential AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        ca.TotalContractVolume,
        ca.AvgContractPrice,
        cp.StdDevLastReading,
        cp.StdDevLastReading / cp.AvgLastReading AS VariabilityRatio
    FROM ConsumerPatterns cp
    JOIN ContractAnalysis ca ON cp.ConsumerID = ca.ConsumerID
    JOIN Consumer c ON cp.ConsumerID = c.ConsumerID
),
Ranking AS (
    SELECT 
        op.ConsumerID,
        op.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        op.TotalContractVolume,
        op.AvgContractPrice,
        op.StdDevLastReading,
        op.VariabilityRatio,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY op.VariabilityRatio DESC, op.StdDevLastReading DESC, op.AvgContractPrice DESC) AS Rank
    FROM OptimizationPotential op
)
SELECT

    c.Name AS ConsumerName,

    c.ContactName,
    c.ContactPhone,

    r.VariabilityRatio,
    cp.MeterCount,
    cp.MeterTypeCount,
    cp.MaxLastReading,
    cp.MinLastReading,
    cp.AvgLastReading
FROM Ranking r
JOIN Consumer c ON r.ConsumerID = c.ConsumerID
JOIN ConsumerPatterns cp ON r.ConsumerID = cp.ConsumerID
WHERE r.Rank <= 38
ORDER BY r.VariabilityRatio DESC, r.StdDevLastReading DESC, r.AvgContractPrice DESC;

WITH ConsumerComplexity AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.Location,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS MeterCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ContractCount,
        AVG(ct.Volume) AS AvgContractVolume,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgContractPrice,
        STDDEV(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS ConsumptionVariability,
        CASE 
            WHEN c.AverageMonthlyConsumption > 20000 THEN 'Высокий'
            WHEN c.AverageMonthlyConsumption > 10000 THEN 'Средний'
            ELSE 'Низкий'
        END AS ConsumptionLevel
    FROM Consumer c
    JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.Location, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
),
ContractAnalysis AS (
    SELECT 
        ca.ConsumerID,
        ca.ConsumerName,
        ca.ConsumerType,
        ca.Location,
        ca.MeterCount,
        ca.ContractCount,
        ca.AvgContractVolume,
        ca.AvgContractPrice,
        ca.ConsumptionVariability,
        ca.ConsumptionLevel,
        SUM(ct.Volume * ct.PricePerUnit) AS TotalContractValue,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ct.SupplierID) AS SupplierCount
    FROM ConsumerComplexity ca
    JOIN `Contract` ct ON ca.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY ca.ConsumerID, ca.ConsumerName, ca.ConsumerType, ca.Location, ca.MeterCount, ca.ContractCount, ca.AvgContractVolume, ca.AvgContractPrice, ca.ConsumptionVariability, ca.ConsumptionLevel
),
OptimizationPotential AS (
    SELECT 
        ca.ConsumerID,
        ca.ConsumerName,
        ca.ConsumerType,
        ca.Location,
        ca.MeterCount,
        ca.ContractCount,
        ca.AvgContractVolume,
        ca.AvgContractPrice,
        ca.ConsumptionVariability,
        ca.ConsumptionLevel,
        ca.TotalContractValue,
        ca.SupplierCount,
        CASE 
            WHEN ca.ConsumptionVariability > 1000 THEN 'Высокий'
            WHEN ca.ConsumptionVariability > 500 THEN 'Средний'
            ELSE 'Низкий'
        END AS OptimizationPotentialLevel
    FROM ContractAnalysis ca
)
SELECT 
    op.ConsumerName,
    op.ConsumerType,
    op.Location,
    op.MeterCount,
    op.ContractCount,
    ROUND(op.AvgContractVolume, 2) AS AvgContractVolume,
    ROUND(op.AvgContractPrice, 2) AS AvgContractPrice,
    ROUND(op.ConsumptionVariability, 2) AS ConsumptionVariability,
    op.ConsumptionLevel,
    ROUND(op.TotalContractValue, 2) AS TotalContractValue,
    op.SupplierCount,
    op.OptimizationPotentialLevel
FROM OptimizationPotential op
ORDER BY op.ConsumptionVariability DESC, op.TotalContractValue DESC
LIMIT 38;

WITH ConsumerMeters AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        c.Type AS ConsumerType,
        c.AverageMonthlyConsumption,
        COUNT(m.MeterID) AS MeterCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS MeterTypeCount,

    FROM Consumer c

    WHERE m.LastReadingDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name, c.Type, c.AverageMonthlyConsumption
),
ConsumerContracts AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        COUNT(ct.ContractID) AS ContractCount,
        SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgPricePerUnit,
        SUM(ct.Volume * ct.PricePerUnit) AS TotalContractValue
    FROM Consumer c

    WHERE ct.Status = 'active'
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
OptimizationPotential AS (

        cm.ConsumerType,
        cm.MeterCount,
        cm.MeterTypeCount,
        cm.ConsumptionVariation,
        cm.AvgConsumption,
        cc.ContractCount,
        cc.TotalContractVolume,
        cc.AvgPricePerUnit,
        cc.TotalContractValue,
        CASE 
            WHEN cm.ConsumptionVariation > (cm.AvgConsumption * 0.5) THEN 'Высокий потенциал'
            WHEN cm.ConsumptionVariation > (cm.AvgConsumption * 0.2) THEN 'Средний потенциал'
            ELSE 'Низкий потенциал'

    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID

ComplexContractAnalysis AS (

        c.ConsumerID,
        COUNT(*) AS ContractsCount,
        AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgContractPrice,
        SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume,
        MAX(ct.EndDate) AS LatestContractEndDate
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID
),
OptimizationPotential AS (
    SELECT 
        ca.ConsumerID,

        ca.AvgContractPrice,
        ca.TotalContractVolume,
        cm.UniqueMetersCount,
        cm.DifferentMeterTypes,
        cm.ReadingVariability,
        cm.OldestCalibrationDate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cm.ReadingVariability DESC, ca.ContractsCount DESC, ca.TotalContractVolume DESC) AS ComplexityRank
    FROM ComplexMeterAnalysis cm
    JOIN ComplexContractAnalysis ca ON cm.ConsumerID = ca.ConsumerID
)

    c.Location,

WITH ComplexConsumptionPatterns AS (
    SELECT 
        c.ConsumerID,
        c.Name AS ConsumerName,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MeterID) AS UniqueMetersCount,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.Type) AS DifferentMeterTypes,
        STDDEV_SAMP(m.LastReading) AS VarianceInReadings,
        AVG(m.LastReading) AS AverageConsumption,
        MIN(m.LastReading) AS MinConsumption,
        MAX(m.LastReading) AS MaxConsumption,
        AVG(coalesce(ct.PricePerUnit, 0)) AS AvgContractPrice,
        SUM(coalesce(ct.Volume, 0)) AS TotalContractVolume
    FROM Consumer c
    LEFT JOIN Meter m ON c.ConsumerID = m.ConsumerID
    LEFT JOIN `Contract` ct ON c.ConsumerID = ct.ConsumerID
    WHERE m.InstallationDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
      AND ct.StartDate <= CURRENT_DATE AND (ct.EndDate IS NULL OR ct.EndDate >= CURRENT_DATE)
    GROUP BY c.ConsumerID, c.Name
), 
OptimizationPotential AS (
    SELECT 
        ccp.ConsumerID,
        ccp.ConsumerName,
        ccp.UniqueMetersCount,
        ccp.DifferentMeterTypes,
        ccp.VarianceInReadings,
        ccp.AverageConsumption,
        ccp.MinConsumption,
        ccp.MaxConsumption,
        ccp.AvgContractPrice,
        ccp.TotalContractVolume,
        CASE 
            WHEN ccp.VarianceInReadings / ccp.AverageConsumption > 0.5 THEN 'High'
            WHEN ccp.VarianceInReadings / ccp.AverageConsumption > 0.2 THEN 'Medium'
            ELSE 'Low'
        END AS OptimizationPotential
    FROM ComplexConsumptionPatterns ccp
)
SELECT *
FROM OptimizationPotential
WHERE OptimizationPotential <> 'Low'
ORDER BY VarianceInReadings DESC, UniqueMetersCount DESC
LIMIT 38;

queries.question: Найти топ-40 подстанций с наиболее сложной системой управления за последний год, анализируя количество инцидентов, нагрузку, обслуживание и подключенные линии электропередачи, с оценкой потенциальных рисков и эффективности.
queries.sql_query:
WITH SubstationIncidents AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        s.Name AS SubstationName,
        s.CapacityMW,
        s.VoltageLevel,
        COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS TotalIncidentsCount,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN i.Severity = 'Критическая' THEN 1 END) AS CriticalIncidentsCount,
        MAX(i.Date) AS LastIncidentDate,
        AVG(i.DurationHours) AS AvgIncidentDuration
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN Incident i ON 1=1
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID, s.Name, s.CapacityMW, s.VoltageLevel
),
SubstationMaintenance AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        SUM(m.Cost) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
        COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN Maintenance m ON 1=1
    WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
),
SubstationConnections AS (
    SELECT 
        s.SubstationID,
        COUNT(DISTINCT tl.LineID) AS ConnectedLinesCount,
        SUM(tl.CapacityMW) AS TotalLineCapacity,
        COUNT(DISTINCT c.ConsumerID) AS IndustrialConsumersCount,
        SUM(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption
    FROM Substation s
    JOIN TransmissionLine tl ON s.SubstationID = tl.LineID
    JOIN Consumer c ON 1=1
    WHERE c.Type = 'Промышленность'
    GROUP BY s.SubstationID
)
SELECT 
    si.SubstationName,
    ROUND(si.CapacityMW, 2) AS CapacityMW,
    si.VoltageLevel,
    si.TotalIncidentsCount,
    si.CriticalIncidentsCount,
    ROUND(si.AvgIncidentDuration, 2) AS AvgIncidentDuration,
    ROUND(sm.TotalMaintenanceCost, 2) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    sm.MaintenanceCount,
    ROUND(sm.AvgMaintenanceDuration, 2) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    sc.ConnectedLinesCount,
    ROUND(sc.TotalLineCapacity, 2) AS TotalLineCapacity,
    sc.IndustrialConsumersCount,
    ROUND(sc.TotalIndustrialConsumption, 2) AS TotalIndustrialConsumption,
    CASE 
        WHEN si.CriticalIncidentsCount > 2 THEN 'Критический уровень сложности'
        WHEN si.CriticalIncidentsCount > 0 THEN 'Высокий уровень сложности'
        ELSE 'Средний уровень сложности'
    END AS ComplexityLevel
FROM SubstationIncidents si
JOIN SubstationMaintenance sm ON si.SubstationID = sm.SubstationID
JOIN SubstationConnections sc ON si.SubstationID = sc.SubstationID
ORDER BY si.CriticalIncidentsCount DESC, si.TotalIncidentsCount DESC
LIMIT 40;

    FROM SubstationIncidents si

    COALESCE(sm.TotalMaintenanceCost, 0) AS TotalMaintenanceCost,
    COALESCE(sm.MaintenanceCount, 0) AS MaintenanceCount,
    COALESCE(ROUND(sm.AvgMaintenanceDuration, 2), 0) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration,
    COALESCE(cl.ConnectedLinesCount, 0) AS ConnectedLinesCount,
    COALESCE(ROUND(cl.TotalLinesCapacity, 2), 0) AS TotalLinesCapacity,
    CASE
        WHEN si.TotalIncidentsCount > 5 THEN 'Высокий риск'
        WHEN si.TotalIncidentsCount > 2 THEN 'Средний риск'
        ELSE 'Низкий риск'
    END AS RiskLevel,
    (si.TotalIncidentsCount * 0.4 + COALESCE(sm.MaintenanceCount, 0) * 0.3 + COALESCE(cl.ConnectedLinesCount, 0) * 0.3) AS ComplexityScore
FROM SubstationIncidents si
LEFT JOIN SubstationMaintenance sm ON si.SubstationID = sm.SubstationID
LEFT JOIN ConnectedLines cl ON si.SubstationID = cl.SubstationID
ORDER BY ComplexityScore DESC
LIMIT 40;

queries.gigachat_response:
WITH SubstationComplexity AS (
    SELECT 
        ss.SubstationID,
        ss.Name AS SubstationName,
        COUNT(DISTINCT i.IncidentID) AS IncidentCount,
        SUM(i.DurationHours) AS TotalIncidentDuration,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount,
        SUM(m.DurationHours) AS TotalMaintenanceDuration,
        COUNT(DISTINCT tl.LineID) AS ConnectedLinesCount,
        COALESCE(SUM(c.AverageMonthlyConsumption), 0) AS TotalConnectedLoad
    FROM Substation ss
    LEFT JOIN Incident i ON ss.SubstationID = i.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON ss.SubstationID = m.PlantID
    LEFT JOIN TransmissionLine tl ON ss.SubstationID = tl.OwnerCompanyID
    LEFT JOIN Consumer c ON ss.SubstationID = c.ConsumerID
    WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
       OR m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
    GROUP BY ss.SubstationID, ss.Name
),
RiskAssessment AS (
    SELECT 
        sc.SubstationID,
        sc.SubstationName,
        sc.IncidentCount,
        sc.TotalIncidentDuration,
        sc.MaintenanceCount,
        sc.TotalMaintenanceDuration,
        sc.ConnectedLinesCount,
        sc.TotalConnectedLoad,
        CASE 
            WHEN sc.IncidentCount > 5 THEN 'Высокий риск'
            WHEN sc.IncidentCount > 2 THEN 'Умеренный риск'
            ELSE 'Низкий риск'
        END AS RiskLevel,
        CASE 
            WHEN sc.MaintenanceCount > 10 THEN 'Требует особого внимания'
            WHEN sc.MaintenanceCount > 5 THEN 'Нормальное состояние'
            ELSE 'Хорошее состояние'
        END AS MaintenanceEffectiveness
    FROM SubstationComplexity sc
)
SELECT *
FROM RiskAssessment
ORDER BY IncidentCount DESC, MaintenanceCount DESC
LIMIT 40;

queries.sql_query: WITH SupplierDiversity AS (  SELECT  s.SupplierID,  s.Name AS SupplierName,  s.Rating,  s.Country,  COUNT(DISTINCT es.Type) AS EnergySourceTypeCount,  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT es.Type) AS EnergySourceTypes,  AVG(s.AnnualSupplyVolume) AS AvgAnnualSupply  FROM Supplier s  JOIN EnergySource es ON s.SourceID = es.SourceID  GROUP BY s.SupplierID, s.Name, s.Rating, s.Country  HAVING EnergySourceTypeCount > 1  ),  SupplierContracts AS (  SELECT  sd.SupplierID,  sd.SupplierName,  COUNT(DISTINCT ct.ContractID) AS ContractCount,  SUM(ct.Volume) AS TotalContractVolume,  AVG(ct.PricePerUnit) AS AvgContractPrice,  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ct.ConsumerID) AS ConsumerIDs  FROM SupplierDiversity sd  JOIN `Contract` ct ON sd.SupplierID = ct.SupplierID  WHERE ct.StartDate >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 2 YEAR)  GROUP BY sd.SupplierID, sd.SupplierName  )  SELECT  sd.SupplierName,  sd.Rating,  sd.Country,  sd.EnergySourceTypeCount,  sd.EnergySourceTypes,  sd.AvgAnnualSupply,  sc.ContractCount,  sc.TotalContractVolume,  sc.AvgContractPrice  FROM SupplierDiversity sd  JOIN SupplierContracts sc ON sd.SupplierID = sc.SupplierID  ORDER BY sd.EnergySourceTypeCount DESC, sd.Rating DESC, sd.AvgAnnualSupply DESC  LIMIT 36;

queries.question: Какие топ-5 электростанции имеют наибольшую эффективность использования топлива (отношение мощности к выбросам CO2) и их текущий статус, сгруппированные по типу электростанции?
queries.sql_query:
WITH PlantEfficiency AS (
    SELECT 
        pp.PlantID,
        pp.Name AS PlantName,
        pp.Type AS PlantType,
        pp.Status AS PlantStatus,
        pp.CapacityMW,
        COALESCE(SUM(e.CO2Emissions), 0) AS TotalCO2Emissions,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(SUM(e.CO2Emissions), 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE pp.CapacityMW / COALESCE(SUM(e.CO2Emissions), 0)
        END AS Efficiency
    FROM PowerPlant pp
    LEFT JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID
    GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.Name, pp.Type, pp.Status, pp.CapacityMW
),
RankedEfficiency AS (
    SELECT 
        PlantType,
        PlantName,
        PlantStatus,
        Efficiency,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY PlantType ORDER BY Efficiency DESC) AS EfficiencyRank
    FROM PlantEfficiency
)
SELECT 
    PlantType,
    PlantName,
    PlantStatus,
    ROUND(Efficiency, 2) AS Efficiency
FROM RankedEfficiency
WHERE EfficiencyRank <= 5
ORDER BY PlantType, Efficiency DESC;

queries.sql_query: WITH PlantIncidents AS (  SELECT  pp.PlantID,  pp.Name AS PlantName,  oc.Name AS OwnerName,  COUNT(i.IncidentID) AS RecentIncidents  FROM PowerPlant pp  JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON pp.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID  JOIN Incident i ON pp.PlantID = i.PlantID  WHERE i.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)  GROUP BY pp.PlantID, pp.Name, oc.Name  ),  PlantMaintenance AS (  SELECT  pp.PlantID,  AVG(m.Cost) AS AvgMaintenanceCost  FROM PowerPlant pp  JOIN Maintenance m ON pp.PlantID = m.PlantID  WHERE m.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)  GROUP BY pp.PlantID  )  SELECT  pi.OwnerName,  pi.PlantName,  pi.RecentIncidents,  pm.AvgMaintenanceCost AS AvgMaintenanceCost  FROM PlantIncidents pi  JOIN PlantMaintenance pm ON pi.PlantID = pm.PlantID  ORDER BY pi.RecentIncidents DESC  LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Какие топ-7 электростанций имеют наибольшую разницу между плановым и фактическим объемом выбросов CO2 за последний квартал, сгруппированные по типу электростанции и владельцу?
queries.sql_query: WITH LastQuarterEmissions AS (  SELECT  pp.PlantID,  pp.Name AS PlantName,  pp.Type AS PlantType,  oc.Name AS OwnerName,  e.CO2Emissions AS ActualEmissions,  e.ReportingPeriod,  e.Date  FROM PowerPlant pp  JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON pp.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID  JOIN Emission e ON pp.PlantID = e.PlantID  WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)  ),  EmissionDeviations AS (  SELECT  lqe.PlantName,  lqe.PlantType,  lqe.OwnerName,  lqe.ActualEmissions,  lqe.ReportingPeriod,  lqe.Date,  ABS(lqe.ActualEmissions - AVG(lqe.ActualEmissions) OVER (PARTITION BY lqe.PlantType)) AS EmissionDeviation  FROM LastQuarterEmissions lqe  )  SELECT  ed.PlantName,  ed.PlantType,  ed.OwnerName,  ed.ActualEmissions AS ActualEmissions,  ed.EmissionDeviation AS EmissionDeviation,  ed.ReportingPeriod  FROM EmissionDeviations ed  ORDER BY ed.EmissionDeviation DESC  LIMIT 7;

WITH EmissionDifference AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID,
        p.Name AS PlantName,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        oc.Name AS OwnerName,
        MAX(e.CO2Emissions) - MIN(e.CO2Emissions) AS CO2EmissionDifference
    FROM Emission e
    JOIN PowerPlant p ON e.PlantID = p.PlantID
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    WHERE e.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY e.PlantID, p.Name, p.Type, oc.Name
),
RankedEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        PlantID,
        PlantName,
        PlantType,
        OwnerName,
        CO2EmissionDifference,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PlantType, OwnerName ORDER BY CO2EmissionDifference DESC) AS Rank
    FROM EmissionDifference
)
SELECT 
    PlantName,
    PlantType,
    OwnerName,
    CO2EmissionDifference
FROM RankedEmissions
WHERE Rank <= 7
ORDER BY PlantType, OwnerName, CO2EmissionDifference DESC;

)

WITH LatestQuarterEmission AS (

        PlantID,
        MAX(Date) AS LatestDate
    FROM Emission
    WHERE ReportingPeriod LIKE '%Q%'
      AND Year(Date) = Year(CURRENT_DATE)
    GROUP BY PlantID
),
LatestEmissionData AS (
    SELECT 
        e.PlantID,
        e.CO2Emissions AS ActualCO2Emissions,
        ep.PlanningValue AS PlannedCO2Emissions
    FROM Emission e
    INNER JOIN LatestQuarterEmission leq ON e.PlantID = leq.PlantID AND e.Date = leq.LatestDate
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT 
            PlantID,
            AVG(CO2Emissions) AS PlanningValue
        FROM Emission
        WHERE ReportingPeriod NOT LIKE '%Q%' -- Assuming planning values do not contain quarter indicators
          AND Year(Date) = Year(CURRENT_DATE)
        GROUP BY PlantID
    ) ep ON e.PlantID = ep.PlantID
),
DifferenceInEmissions AS (
    SELECT 
        led.PlantID,
        ABS(led.ActualCO2Emissions - led.PlannedCO2Emissions) AS Difference,
        p.Type AS PlantType,
        oc.Name AS OwnerName
    FROM LatestEmissionData led
    INNER JOIN PowerPlant p ON led.PlantID = p.PlantID
    INNER JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON p.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
)

    d.Difference AS EmissionsDifference,

        ep.PlantID,
        ep.Type AS PlantType,
        oc.Name AS OwnerName,

        AVG(es.EmissionFactor) AS PlannedCO2Emissions
    FROM PowerPlant ep
    JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON ep.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID
    JOIN EnergySource es ON ep.Type = es.Type
    JOIN Emission em ON ep.PlantID = em.PlantID
    WHERE em.ReportingPeriod LIKE '%Q4%'
      AND em.Date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
    GROUP BY ep.PlantID, ep.Type, oc.Name
), 
DifferenceAnalysis AS (

        ed.PlannedCO2Emissions,

        ed.PlantType,

    FROM EmissionsData ed

queries.sql_query: WITH SubstationLines AS (  SELECT  s.SubstationID,  s.Name AS SubstationName,  s.Location AS Region,  oc.Name AS OwnerName,  COUNT(DISTINCT tl.VoltageLevel) AS DifferentVoltageLevels,  COUNT(tl.LineID) AS TotalLines  FROM Substation s  JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON s.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID  JOIN TransmissionLine tl ON (s.Location = tl.StartLocation OR s.Location = tl.EndLocation)  GROUP BY s.SubstationID, s.Name, s.Location, oc.Name  )  SELECT  sl.SubstationName,  sl.Region,  sl.OwnerName,  sl.DifferentVoltageLevels,  sl.TotalLines  FROM SubstationLines sl  ORDER BY sl.DifferentVoltageLevels DESC, sl.TotalLines DESC  LIMIT 6;

queries.question: Какие топ-7 поставщиков имеют наибольшую разницу между максимальной и минимальной ценой в контрактах с промышленными потребителями, сгруппированные по типу продукта и стране происхождения?
queries.sql_query: SELECT  s.Name AS SupplierName,  es.Type AS ProductType,  s.Country,  (MAX(c.PricePerUnit) - MIN(c.PricePerUnit)) AS PriceRange  FROM Supplier s  JOIN EnergySource es ON s.SourceID = es.SourceID  JOIN `Contract` c ON s.SupplierID = c.SupplierID  JOIN Consumer co ON c.ConsumerID = co.ConsumerID  WHERE co.Type = 'Промышленность'  GROUP BY s.Name, es.Type, s.Country  ORDER BY PriceRange DESC  LIMIT 7;

WITH IndustrialContracts AS (
    SELECT 
        c.SupplierID,
        c.PricePerUnit,
        es.Type AS ProductType,
        s.Country
    FROM `Contract` c
    JOIN Consumer con ON c.ConsumerID = con.ConsumerID
    JOIN Supplier s ON c.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
    JOIN EnergySource es ON s.SourceID = es.SourceID
    WHERE con.Type = 'Промышленность'
),
PriceDifferences AS (
    SELECT 
        ic.SupplierID,
        ic.ProductType,
        ic.Country,
        MAX(ic.PricePerUnit) - MIN(ic.PricePerUnit) AS PriceDifference
    FROM IndustrialContracts ic
    GROUP BY ic.SupplierID, ic.ProductType, ic.Country
)
SELECT 
    s.Name AS SupplierName,
    pd.ProductType,
    pd.Country,
    ROUND(pd.PriceDifference, 2) AS PriceDifference
FROM PriceDifferences pd
JOIN Supplier s ON pd.SupplierID = s.SupplierID
ORDER BY pd.PriceDifference DESC
LIMIT 7;

queries.question: Какие подстанции напряжением 220 кВ и их владельцы имеют более одной подстанции?
queries.sql_query: SELECT  oc.Name AS OwnerName,  COUNT(s.SubstationID) AS SubstationCount  FROM Substation s  JOIN OwnerCompany oc ON s.OwnerCompanyID = oc.CompanyID  WHERE s.VoltageLevel = 220  GROUP BY oc.CompanyID, oc.Name  HAVING COUNT(s.SubstationID) > 1;

    SELECT

    WHERE VoltageLevel = 220
    GROUP BY OwnerCompanyID
    HAVING COUNT(SubstationID) > 1
)

    s.VoltageLevel,
    s.CommissionDate,
    s.Status,
    oc.Name AS OwnerCompanyName,
    oc.Headquarters,
    oc.CEO

WHERE s.VoltageLevel = 220
ORDER BY oc.Name, s.Name;

queries.question: Какие электростанции имеют среднюю продолжительность обслуживания более 4.0 часов?
queries.sql_query: SELECT pp.Name AS PlantName, COUNT(m.MaintenanceID) AS MaintenanceCount, AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgDuration FROM PowerPlant pp JOIN Maintenance m ON pp.PlantID = m.PlantID WHERE m.Status = 'Завершено' GROUP BY pp.Name HAVING AVG(m.DurationHours) > 4.0;
queries.gpt-4o_response:

    pp.Name AS PlantName,
    AVG(m.DurationHours) AS AvgMaintenanceDuration
FROM

    pp.PlantID, pp.Name

    AVG(m.DurationHours) > 4.0;
